Молоко овцы высоко ценится среди покупателей из - за своих целебных качеств.Ихболджон любит свое стадо , ей нравится работать на поле на свежем воздухе,она почти никогда не болеет.Сейчас она планирует отремонтировать дом перед началом зимы и купить строительные материалы. Но ей не хватает денег для осуществления плана.Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за помощью.Она надеется,что МДО Арванд выделит ей нужную сумму и Ихболджон благодарна за то,что в любые моменты ее жизни она может обратиться в МДО Арванд и всегда получить помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Ihboldzhon is a woman of 40 years. She is married and the mother of four children. After having received her teaching degree, she was not able to work with her profession, as the teacher salary was not enough even for the everyday expenses. Therefore she decided to start her own livestock breeding business. On a plot of land she inherited from her grandfather, Ihboldzhon started breeding livestock. 

Currently Ihboldzhon has a large herd of cows, rams and sheep. Every morning her daughter helps her with milking the cows and bringing the milk to the market to sell. The sheep milk is highly appreciated by their customers due to its healing qualities. Ihboldzhon loves her herd and likes to work in the field with fresh air. She is almost never ill. 

Now she is planning to repair her house before the start of the winter, and she needs to purchase building material. However, she does not have enough money for realizing her plans. Therefore she turned to "MDO Arvand" for help. She hopes that "MDO Arvand" will give her the needed amount. Ihboldzhon is thankful that in different stages of her life, she is able to turn to "MDO Arvand", and she always gets help and support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Ermambet

texts.ru: Эрмамбет мужчина 60 лет , женат , счастливый отец пятерых детей и пятнадцати внуков.Он посвятил больше 45 лет своей жизни животноводству , работе на поле , выращиванию урожая. И ни разу за все это время он не пожаловался ни на мороз,ни на палящую жару,работал при высокой температуре и мазолях на руках.Он работал не покладая рук ,потому что понимал , что он кормилец в семье и его дома ждут жена и пятеро детей,которых нужно накормить.Вначале он работал на ферме,вскоре начал собственное дело.На собственные сбережения он купил участок земли,на котором и начал заниматься разведением скота.Сейчас у него большое стадо : 20 баранов и 3 коровы. Дойдя до пожилого возраста , он всё равно продолжает заниматься своим любимым делом и ухаживает за скотом с любовью и заботой.В его делах помогают ему сыновья и жена.В настоящее время Эрмамбет хочет закупить корм для скота на зиму,но ему не хватает денег.Поэтому он и обратился в МДО Арванд за получением кредита.Он надеется,что МДО Арванд одобрит его заявку и выделит ему нужную сумму.Заранее благодарит за понимание и поддержку.
texts.en:
Ermambet is a man of 60 years. He is married and the happy father of five children and fifteen grandchildren. 45 years ago he dedicated his life to livestock breeding, working in the field and growing crops. Not once during this time he has complained about the cold or the scorching heat; he has worked at high temperatures and with blisters on his hands. He has worked hard because he understood that he is the breadwinner in the family and at home his wife and five children were waiting, needing food. 

In the beginning Ermambet worked at a farm, but soon he started his own business. With his own money he purchased a plot of land on which he started breeding cattle. Currently he has a large herd: 20 rams and three cows. Reaching old age, he continued to work with his beloved business, and looks after the cattle with love and care. His sons and wife help him with this. 

Currently, Ermambet would like to purchase livestock feed for the winter, but he does not have enough money. Therefore he turned to "MDO Arvand" to get a loan. He hopes that "MDO Arvand" approves his application and lends him the necessary amount. He thanks for the understanding and support in advance.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Manos Unidas De Amadeo Repeto Ii Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MANOS UNIDAS DE AMADEO REPETO II, la socia Victoria tiene 29 años  de edad tiene 02 hijos y es soltera,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de trabajos de melamina,la socia elabora diferentes tipos de trabajo como reposteros, andamios entre otros, la socia se siente agradecida por el  crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de melanina.
Los demas socios se dedican a la venta de ropa,transporte,negocio de spa.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Manos Unidad de Amadeo Repeto II communal bank group. She is Victoria, 29 years old, she has 2 children and is single. She divides her time between her daily activities and her work with melamine. She makes different types of things such as kitchen cabinets and shelving among others. She is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments. She has been in her business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the dedication she puts into her business every day. She wants to be able to continue working so that in this way she can continue supporting her family. 

She asks for the loan to purchase melamine.

The other members works selling clothing, in transportation, and in a spa business.

The members who are in the attached photo asked to get to the meeting late because of work reasons.

loans.use: to purchase melamine

loans.name: Ruzimo

texts.ru: Рузимо женщина 50 лет , замужем,мать четверых детей. Она выросла в сельской местности и с детства работала на поле,ухаживала за скотом,выращивала урожай. После замужества она продолжила заниматься животноводством . Вначале  у нее было всего лишь одна корова , потом со временем она увеличила поголовье своего скота ,и сейчас на своем участке земли она ухаживает за пятью коровами и семью барашками. Молоко,полученное от дойки коров,младшая дочь Рузимо каждое утро относит на рынок и продаёт. Рузимо и её муж усердно работают  ,чтобы поставить на ноги свою младшую дочь и дать ей образование,чтобы она могла жить не зная нужд. Рузимо берет кредит,чтобы закупить корм для скота на зиму,но у нее нет полной суммы . Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Она надеется,что МДО Арванд откликнется на ее просьбу о помощи и выделит ей нужную сумму.Заранее благодарит за содействие.
texts.en:
Ruzimo is a woman of 50 years. She is married and the mother of four children. She grew up in a village and since childhood she has worked in the field, looking after cattle and growing crops. After getting married, she continued to work with livestock breeding. 

In the beginning Ruzimo had only one cow. After a while she increased the number of livestock and currently she looks after five cows and seven rams on her own plot of land. Every morning Ruzimo's youngest daughter takes the milk she gets from milking the cows to the market to sell. Ruzimo and her husband work hard in order to raise their youngest daughter and give her an education, so that she will be able to live without knowing any need. 

Ruzimo takes a loan in order to purchase livestock fodder for the winter, as she does not have the full amount herself. Therefore she turned to "MDO Arvand" for financial support. She hopes that "MDO Arvand" responds to her request for help and lends her the necessary amount. She thanks in advance for the assistance.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Hipatia De Jesus

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nuestra Señora De la Luz se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Hipatia, tiene 56 años de edad, hace algunos años su esposo falleció y quedo viuda pero de esta relación tuvo 4 hijos, todos  mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun viven en su casa.
Doña Hipatia es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta a base de esfuerzo salir adelante, ella se dedica al comercio en lo que es venta de joyas de oro y plata, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta aunque la mayor parte de sus ventas las realiza en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan de algún producto de los que ella vende, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana, a ella le envía estos productos una hermana desde Cuenca ya que allá consigue de muy buena calidad y a buen precio. Lleva más de 20 años en este negocio con el cual sale adelante.	
Este crédito es para comprar joyas de plata y oro. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The Nuestra Señora De la Luz communal bank group meets every two weeks in the city of Manta. This is a city known for its lovely beaches, which are visited by many people all year round, and for being a city with an unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions. 

Hipatia lives in this place. She is 56 year old and some years ago her husband died and left her a widow, but in this relationship she had 4 children, all of them adults, one of whom still lives in her house. 

Hipatia is a very hard-working woman who likes to get ahead with her efforts. She works in sales and what she sells is gold and silver jewelry. She sells from door to door although the majority of her sales are made in her house, where customers come when they need a product that she sells. She leaves her products on credit and collects each week. Her sister sends her the products from Cuenca since there she can get them at very good quality and a good price.  She has been in this business for more than 20 years and with it she gets ahead.

This loan is to purchase silver and gold jewelry. She has been in the communal bank group from the beginning and she likes it for the help that the loans offer. Her dream is to have a big retail space.

loans.use: to purchase silver and gold jewelry.

loans.name: Julio Audilio

texts.es:
Julio es una persona que le gusta trabajar en beneficio de su familia, vive junto a sus tres tiene hijos y su esposa en una comunidad de Sololá. 
Julio es una persona muy dedicada a su trabajo, ya que de esa manera puede generar sus ingresos para los gastos necesarios de su familia y  para que sus hijos vivan en armonía.  
Este hombre trabaja como piloto automovilista de un transporte urbano, desde hace 20 años, oficio que aprendió con su padre , le llamo la atención y ahora ejerce ese trabajo,  es una persona que se identifica con la sociedad partiendo desde su amabilidad  en el trato de las persona  y por  los años de experiencia que lleva trabajando. 
Julio para el bienestar de su familia compro un vehículo, pero del uso que se ha dado ahora necesita  cambiarle algunos accesorios, pero él no cuenta con dinero para hacerlo, la solución para arreglar su vehículo es conseguir un préstamo,  para poder llevar a cabo este trabajo para recuperar su vehículo.
texts.en: Julio is a person who likes to work for the benefit of his family. He lives together with his three children and his wife in a community of Solola. Julio is a very dedicated person to his job, because it is his means of generating his income for the necessary expenses of his family, in order for his children to live in harmony. This man has worked for 20 years as a bus pilot in public transportation. He learned this job with his father who made him work in it. He is a person who is characterized by his kindness on treating people and for the years of experience he has in his job. Julio bought a vehicle for the well being of his family. Due to use, he now needs to change some of the vehicle accessories. Since he does not have the money, the loan will be helpful in fixing his vehicle. With it he will have this job done and repair his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Jaime Adilio

texts.es:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado un Cantón que día con día va creciendo, en este Cantón hay mucho comercio debido a que es el corazón de muchos recintos que están cerca, el mismo tiene un clima cálido húmedo está rodeado de gente amable y trabajadora  en este Cantón vive y traba el señor Jaime un hombre luchador de 27 años trabaja como agricultor en una finca del sector, mantienen una sólida relación en unión libre de la cual tienen un hijo de un año de edad la esposa no trabaja pasa en casa al cuidado del niño, ellos vienen de familias de bajos recursos económicos y gran parte de sus vidas han tenido que trabajar para salir adelante, sus padres se dedican a la agricultura, 
solicitan este crédito para emprender en una granja de  pollos, de esta actividad aprendieron junto con sus padres, con esta inversión podrán mejorar sus ingresos económicos y darle un mejor futuro a su pequeño hijo El señor Jaime agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado is a canton which is growing every day. In this canton there is a lot of commerce as it is at the heart of many precincts. It has a warm and humid climate and is surrounded by friendly and hardworking people. 
In this canton lives and works Mr. Jaime. He is a determined man of 27 years old who works as a farmer. He maintains a solid relationship in common-law marriage and they have a son of one year old. His wife does not work. She stays in the house taking care of the child. They both come from families with low economic resources and a big part of their lives they have had to work to get ahead. Their parents make a living with farming. 
He requests this loan to start up a chicken farm. They have learned about this activity from their parents. With this investment they can improve their economic income and give a better future to their little child. Mister Jaime thanks Fundación Alternative and Kiva for their support and the opportunity offered.

loans.use: to start up a chicken farm

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru: Саломат 52 года.  Она замужем и у нее трое детей. Образование у нее среднее. Эта жизнерадостная трудолюбивая женщина с детства занимается семьей и детьми . Теперь уже у нее и внуки , которых она помогает детям поставить на ноги.  Своих детей Саломат вырастила и теперь они на заработках.  Конечно дети помогают родителям но Саломат хотелось бы самой также помогать детям.  Для утепления жилья Саломат хочет взять кредит и  сделать ремонт , чтобы внуки не замерзали в зимние олода.  Помогать погашать кредит конечно будут дети .   Она хочет воспользоваться услугами «Арванд» и  улучшить утеплить свой дом. Она заранее  благодарит Арванд за поддержку и понимание.
texts.en:
Salomat is 52 years old. She is married and has three children. She has secondary education. This happy and hardworking woman has been interested in family and children since her childhood. Currently she even has grandchildren, who she helps her children to bring up. 

Salomat's children grew up and currently they are migrant workers. Of course the children help their parents, but Salomat would also like to help them back. To insulate their housing, Salomat takes a loan to do renovation, so that her grandchildren will not be col during the winter. Her children will of course help her pay back the loan. 

Salomat would like to take advantage of the services of "Arvand" and better insulate their home. She thanks "Arvand" in advance for the support and understanding.

loans.use: to buy building materials to insulate her home

loans.name: Anvarjon

texts.ru: Анварчон мужчина 50 лет ,трудолюбивый работник, заботливый муж и  отец четверых детей.На протяжение вот уже 25 лет он занимается животноводством.Он начал работать в 15 лет,чтобы помогать больным родителям.Работал грузчиком в ночную смену,днем работал на ферме.Вскоре накопив деньги он купил несколько голов домашнего скота и начал заниматься собственным бизнесом.Сейчас у него 15 гектаров земли ,где он ухаживает за своим скотом.У него в стаде 15 баранов и 3 коровы.Так же на участке земли его жена занимается земледелием .Она выращивает овощи и фрукты,которые также продает на рынке.Анварчон любит свое дело , трудится усердно .Он поставил на ноги троих сыновей,женил их и обеспечил всем необходимым для жизни.Сейчас его младшая дочь заканчивает школу ,и он берет кредит,чтобы до ее окончания он мог расширить поголовье своего стада и расширить бизнес,чтобы иметь возможность оплатить ей университет.Поэтмоу он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Анварчон надеется на положительный ответ от Арванд и выражает свою благодарность за сотрудничество и доверие.
texts.en:
Anvarjon is a man of 50 years. He is a hardworking man, a loving husband and the father of four children. For a period of 25 years already, he has worked with livestock breeding. He started working when he was 15 in order to help his sick parents. He worked as a loader on a night shift, and during the day he worked at their farm. 

After having saved money he purchased some livestock and started his own business. Currently he has 15 hectares of land, where he looks after his own livestock. He has fifteen rams and three cows in his herd. His wife also works with field crop cultivation on the land. She grows vegetables and fruit, which she sells at the market. 

Anvarjon loves his work and works hard. He has raised three sons, married them away and educated them as needed for adult life. Currently his youngest daughter is soon finishing school, and he takes a loan so that when she finishes, he will be able to expand his herd and his business to give her the opportunity to go to university. Therefore he turned to "MDO Arvand" for financial support. Anvarjon hopes for a positive reply from "Arvand" and extends his gratitude for the collaboration and faith.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to expand his herd

loans.name: Couronne De Vie Group

texts.fr: Bernadine est une commerçante et présidente d’un groupe d’affaires «Couronne de vie», entrepreneuse, âgée de 59 ans, veuve et mère de 4 enfants, dont 2 étudient et 2 sont mariés. La cliente est une vendeuse des ordinateurs et les des pièces détachées. Elle étale sa marchandise dans un magasin de la ville. Elle commença ses business avec de fonds reçu son mari lors de son vivant. Il y a 10 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 5 ordinateurs et autres pièces. Ainsi, elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneuses non bancables.
texts.en: Bernadine is a seller and president of business group "Crown of Life," an entrepreneur, 59 years old, a widow, and mother of four, two of whom attend school and two of whom are married. The client sells computers and other accessories. She displays her merchandise in a store in the city. She started her business with funds from her husband when he was alive. She's been running this business for ten years. This new loan will allow her to buy 5 computers and other accessories. Thus, she wishes to buy a plot of land and to pay for her children's schooling. At the end, she strongly thanks Hekima for giving autonomy to unbankable female entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 5 computers and accessories

loans.name: Doris Margarita

texts.es:
Recinto Ganaderos Orense  está ubicado en el Cantón  San Miguel de los Bancos un lugar hermoso y tranquilo de clima cálido húmedo al que muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros les gusta venir a pasar vacaciones o feriados disfrutando de sus maravillosas cascadas y hosterías 
En este Recinto vive y  trabaja la señora Doris una mujer luchadora de 25 años ella es madre soltera tiene una pequeña hija de 2 años, por la que día con día lucha y se esfuerza para salir adelante y darle todo lo necesario para su desarrollo y aprendizaje diario, solicita el crédito para invertir en emprender un negocio, ella conoce mucho sobre la producción de cerdos por eso decidió emprender en esta actividad, cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres y hermanos que fueron con quienes ella aprendió todo lo necesario de esta actividad y quienes la estarán apoyando en la misma, con esta inversión mejoraran sus ingresos económicos y su nivel de vida, la señora Doris agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Precinct Ganadeor Orense is located in the canton San Miguel de los Bancos. It is a beautiful and quiet place with a warm and humid climate to which many national tourists and foreigners like to come and spend their vacation, enjoying its wonderful waterfalls and inns.

In this precinct, lives and works madam Doris. She is a determined woman of 25 years old. She is a single mother and has a small daughter of 2 years old, for whom she fights every day and she strives to get ahead and give her everything that she needs for her development and daily learning.

She requests this loan to invest in starting up a business. She knows a lot about the production of pigs and therefore she decided to start up this activity. She has the support of her parents and siblings, from whom she learned the necessary things about this activity and who will be supporting her in the same. With this investment her economic income and standard of living will improve.

Madam Doris thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for their support and the opportunity given.

loans.use: to start up a pig farm

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy perfume and pomade

loans.name: Los Claveles Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS CLAVELES, la socia Ruth tiene 41 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el  crédito para la compra de arroz, gaseosas entre otros.
La socia se siente gradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios se dedican al negocio de  tienda de abarrotes, venta de escritorios, ferretería, docente.
El socio que sale en la foto adjunto pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank 'Los Claveles'. Member Ruth is 41 years old. She has three children and is married. She alternates her daily activities with the grocery store. She has been in the business for a long time, which goes well thanks to the determination she puts in her business every day. She sells different types of products, like rice, sugar, milk and others. She wishes to be able to continue working in order to keep supporting her family. 

She requests this loan to buy rice, sodas and others. She is thankful for the loan granted and is committed to comply with the set payments. 

The other members make a living with grocery stores, selling of desks, a hardware store and teaching. 

The member that appears in the attached photo, asked permission to be late to the meeting because of work.

loans.use: to buy rice, sodas and others

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice seeds

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es:
La socia Albertina se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,la socia es una mujer emprendedora que le gustaria tener varios restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Albertina, still works in her restaurant business.  She makes various dishes such as baked chicken, soup, and meat "saltados" [sautéed meat].  She wants to get ahead with her business.  She's an enterprising woman who would like to have several restaurants.

Albertina's requesting the loan to buy cooking ingredients such as rice, vegetables, and chicken.

She's happy about the loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients such as rice, vegetables, and chicken

loans.name: Llapanchis Tticarisunchis Group

texts.es:
El grupo pertenece al banco comunal “LLapanchis TTicarisunchis” en la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco.
La socia Pascuala continua con su negocio de venta de anticuchos, la socia vende los anticuchos a sus clientes que le solicitan cada dia, la socia continua vendiendo de manera ambualtoria, la socia agradece la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de aceite, carbón, carnes entre otros.
Los demás socios se dedican al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, farmacia, panadería venta de ropa.
El socio que sale en la foto adjunta pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
This group is part of the Llapanchis Tticarisunchis communal bank, Cusco province, Cusco region. Pascuela is a member, she is still in the anticuchos [meat skewers] business. She sells anticuchos to customers who order them daily. She is still doing her sales as a street vendor. 

She is thankful for the opportunity offered and she promises to make all of her payments according to the established schedule, as this is the way she will provide for her family.

She is requesting a loan to purchase oil, fuel, meat, etc.

The other members work in businesses including a grocery store, pharmacy, bakery, clothing sales.

The member who appears in the accompanying photo asked permission to be late for the meeting due to work reasons.

loans.use: to purchase oil, fuel, meat, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the repair costs for her son's rickshaw.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
BENKADI est un groupe de l’association LOLO de SANANKORO DJITOUMOU. Il regroupe des femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 41 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne cinq enfants. Elles mènent différentes activités  telles la transformation de farine en galette à l’image de SOUMBADIE qui est la première personne assise de la gauche vers la droite de la photo. Elles vivent dans une famille nucléaire à SANANKORO DJITOUMOU dans la préfecture de KATI (Région de Koulikoro, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités  vente de restauration : farine et huile. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leurs clientèles, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur premier prêt solidaire. 
SOUMBADJE, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à SANANKORO DJITOUMOU, excelle dans la transformation de farine en galette. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 1 sac de farine et une quantité importante d’huile. Elle s’approvisionne à SANANKORO DJITOUMOU. Elle  vend ses aliments à SANANKORO DJITOUMOU, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 12.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et s’investir dans son activité.
texts.en: BENKADI is a group of the LOLO association of SANANKORO DJITOUMOU. It groups together women who met each other through relatives and neighbors. They are on average 41 years old and married with on average five children. They run different businesses, such as making flour into biscuits, as does SOUMBADIE, who is sitting to the far left in the photo. They live in nuclear families in SANANKORO DJITOUMOU in the prefecture of KATI (Koulikoro region, republic of Mali). They have been in small business for several years and are highly sought after in their  food-serving businesses: flour and oil. With the concern of satisfying the growing needs of their clientele, the group members decided to integrate Soro Yiriwaso's loan program. They are on their first group loan. SOUMBADJE, who is the president of the group is well known in SANANKORO DJITOUMOU, excels in making flour into biscuits. She plans to use her loan to buy 1 sack of flour and a large quantity of oil. She stocks up in SANANKORO DJITOUMOU. She sells her food in SANANKORO DJITOUMOU at retail for cash or credit to a clientele composed of men and women. She hopes to make a monthly profit of 12,000 FCFA, which will allow her to repay the loan and to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy flour and oil for making biscuits

loans.name: Sinet

texts.en: Sinet is an 18-year-old accounting freshman at university in the city. She is the single daughter of a farmer family from Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Because Sinet is short of finances, she would like to request a loan to pay her first-year tuition fee. This loan will help her to go through the foundation year successfully. After graduation, she wants to work as an accountant in a company. With her salary, she will be able to help her parents.

loans.use: to pay her first-year tuition fee.

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es: María de 47 años de edad pone todo su empeño para sacar adelante su negocio de venta de bebidas frías, pupusas y tortas actividad que realiza desde hace 4 años que le ha servido para sostener a su familia. Ella habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 2 nietas de 9 y 4 años de edad y un hijo mayor de edad que le apoya con los gastos económicos del hogar. María desea comprar los productos por mayor para tener mejores ganancias y ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus clientes invirtiendo en mesas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: jugos, gaseosas, mesas, etc.
texts.en:
María, 47, puts all her effort into getting ahead with her business selling cold beverages, pupusas, and sandwiches.  She has had this job for four years and its helps her support her family.  She lives in her own home with her two granddaughters, 9 and 4, and an adult son who helps her with the household expenses.

María wants to buy products wholesale to earn more profit and invest in tables to make her customers more comfortable.  She's asking FUSAI for a loan to buy juice, soda, tables, etc.

loans.use: to buy juice, soda, tables, etc.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia Margarita se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cria cuyes y gallinas, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere poner su tienda de abarrotes ya que es su sueño tener su propio negocio, la socia también quiere tener un lugar más amplio para que pueda vender sus animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y también alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Margarita, still works in her business raising animals.  She raises guinea pigs and chickens.  With this business she wants to start a grocery store, because it's her dream to have her own business.  She also wants to have a larger space for selling her animals.

Margarita's requesting the loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens as well as feed for the animals.

She's happy about the loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens as well as feed for the animals

loans.name: Oscar Danilo

texts.es:
En un Camión cargado de piedras canteras se traslada Oscar Danilo a las diferentes comunidades de su ciudad. Anteriormente adquirió un préstamo el cual utilizó para la compra y reventa de piedras, desde entonces este ha sido el negocio que le ha permitido independizarse y salir adelante con su familia. El camión que manipula para su negocio precisa de mantenimiento  técnico, por lo tanto solicita préstamos para cubrir gastos de la revisión del camión, pero sobre todo para invertir en la compra de  piedras. 
A Oscar este negocio le resulta muy lucrativo.  Planea aprovechar la alta demanda en esta época para mejorar sus ingresos. Entre sus propósitos también está la  compra de otro camión y de esta manera extender su negocio a comunidades más lejanas. Considera que la ambición por ayudar a sus seres queridos es lo que lo mantiene firme en la lucha.
texts.en:
In a truck weighed down by quarry stone, Oscar Danilo travels to the different communities of his city. Previously, he got a loan which he used to purchase and resell the stone, since then this has been the business which has allowed him to become independent and get ahead with his family.

The truck that he drives for his business needs technical maintenance, so he asks for loans to cover the costs of the repairs on the truck, but above all to invest in the purchase of stone.

For Oscar, this business has been very profitable. He plans to take advantage of the high demand in this season to improve his income. Among his goals is also purchasing another truck and in this way expanding his business to more distant communities. He considers that the ambition to help his loved one is what keeps him strong in the struggle.

loans.use: to cover the costs of repairing the truck, but above all to invest in the purchase of stone.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing

loans.name: Fariman Group

texts.fr:
FARIMAN est un groupe de l’association DIALABATIGUI de DIALKORO-DJITOUMOU. Il regroupe des femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 47 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne cinq enfants. Elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments  à l’image de GNABA  qui est la première  personne debout de la gauche vers la droite  de la photo. Elles vivent dans une famille nucléaire  à DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU, dans la Sous-Préfecture de OUELESSEBOUGOU (Région de Koulikoro, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités d’achat  vente de condiments : tomate, choux et oignon.
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leurs clientèles, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur premier  prêt solidaire. 
GNABA, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU, excelle dans la vente de condiments. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter une quantité importante de condiments alimentaires de différente sorte (choux, tomate et oignon). Elle s’approvisionne à DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU auprès des grossistes  et vend ses condiments à  DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composés d’hommes et de femmes.    
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 12.000FCFA  somme qui lui  
permettra de rembourser le prêt et s’investir dans son activité.
texts.en: FARIMAN is a group of the DIALABATIGUI association of DIALKORO-DJITOUMOU. It groups together women who met each other through relatives and neighbors. They are on average 47 years old and married with on average five children. They run different businesses, such as buying and selling seasonings, as does GNABA, who is standing to the far left in the photo. They live in nuclear families in DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU in the sous-prefecture of OUELESSEBOUGOU (Koulikoro region, republic of Mali). They have been in small business for several years and are highly sought after in their seasoning businesses: tomatoes, cabbage, and onions. With the concern of satisfying the growing needs of their clientele, the group members decided to integrate Soro Yiriwaso's loan program. They are on their first group loan. GNABA, who is the president of the group and is well known in DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU, excels in selling seasonings. She plans to use her loan to buy a large quantity of different kinds of seasonings (cabbage, tomatoes, and onions). She stocks up in DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU at wholesalers and sells her seasonings in DIALAKORO-DJITOUMOU at retail for cash or credit to a clientele composed of men and women. She hopes to make a monthly profit of 12,000 FCFA, which will allow her to repay the loan and to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy seasonings

loans.name: Judit

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RETO AL FUTURO”.
La socia es la Sra. Judit; La socia  alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de brindar servicio técnico para todo tipo de electrodomesticos,la socia trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo en este negocio, la socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de tornillos, alicates entre otros.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the communal bank Reto Al Futuro. Her name is Judit. 

She alternates her daily activities with the business of providing technical service for all types of appliances. She works with her husband in this business. 

She is grateful to those who are a part of this dream through this medium and she agrees to make her payments on time. She wants to continue working in this way to continue supporting her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy screws, pliers, and more.

loans.use: to buy screws, pliers, and more.

loans.name: Finesse Group

texts.fr:
FINESSE est un groupe de l’association LOLO de SANANKORO-DJITOUMOU. Il regroupe des femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne cinq enfants. Elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments  à l’image de AWA  qui est la première  personne assise de la gauche vers la droite  de la photo. Elles vivent dans une famille nucléaire  à SANANKORO-DJITOUMOU, dans la Préfecture de KATI (Région de Koulikoro, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités d’achat  vente de condiments : tomate, choux et oignon.
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leurs clientèles, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur premier  prêt solidaire. 
AWA, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à  SANANKORO-DJITOUMOU, excelle dans la vente de condiments. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter une quantité importante de choux et oignon.  Elle s’approvisionne à SANANKORO-DJITOUMOU auprès des grossistes  et vend ses condiments à  SANANKORO-DJITOUMOU en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composés d’hommes et de femmes.    
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 4.000FCFA  somme qui lui  
permettra de rembourser le prêt et s’investir dans son activité.
texts.en:
Finesse is a group in the Lolo de Sanankoro-Djitoumou association. It is made up of women who know each other from family and neighborhood ties. The women are married and are, on average, 43 years old with five children. They all live in nuclear families in Sanankoro-Djitoumou, in the Kati prefecture (Koulikoro region, Republic of Mali).

They do different types of work, but mainly they buy and sell condiments, like Awa does, who is the first person seated on the left in the photo.  They have worked in small-scale commerce for several years and are highly sought after in their buying and selling of condiments (tomatoes, cabbage, and onions). With the hopes of satisfying the growing needs of their customers, the group members decided to join Soro Yiriwaso's loan program. They are on their first group loan.

Awa, who is the president of the group and is well known in Sanankoro-Djitoumou, excels in the selling of condiments. She plans to use her loan to buy a large amount of cabbages and onions. She procures her goods in Sanankoro-Djitoumou from wholesalers and sells her condiments at retail in Sanankoro-Djitoumou for cash and credit to male and female customers. 

Awa hopes to earn an monthly profit of 4,000 francs CFA, which will be used to pay back the loan and to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Alfredo Adalberto

texts.es: Alfredo de 52 años de edad es un hombre que pone todo su esfuerzo cada día sacar adelante a su familia con su trabajo como guarda parques, además junto a su compañera de vida vende ropa de forma ambulante en los cantones cercanos. Él habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 5 hijos 3 varones de 15, 12 y 10 años y 2 niñas de 14 y 1 años de edad. Alfredo desea que el negocio que tiene con su compañera de vida le brinde mayores ganancias, ya que en su vivienda los gastos bastante grandes, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: camisas, faldas, blusas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc. Para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y seguir apoyándoles con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Alfredo, 52, is a man who every day puts all his effort into getting his family ahead with his job as a park guard.  He also sells clothing in the street with his life partner in nearby cantons.  He lives in his own home with his partner and his five children: three boys, 15, 12, and 10, and two girls, 14 and 1.

Alfredo wants to earn more income from the business he has with his companion, because he has a lot of household expenses.  He's asking FUSAI for a loan to buy shirts, skirts, blouses, pants, underwear, etc. so he can give his children a better quality of life and keep on helping them with their studies.

loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, blouses, pants, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Yasmin

texts.en:
Yasmin is a 25-year-old single lady from a village near Jenin city. She lives with her parents in a small simple house. Her father works as a construction worker and he gets a low and unstable income. This is the only source of income to the family. Yasmin would like to improve the family living conditions and buy all the needed items.

Yasmin took a loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for the family home. By taking this loan, Yasmin will be able to provide hot water for her family without using electricity. Yasmin appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water and a tank for the family home.

loans.name: Ergash

texts.en: Ergash is a handsome man. He was born in 1969. He lives in a village. He is married and has three children. He has been in the cattle business for about ten years. His wife and daughter-in-law are helping him. They work together. He buys and sells cattle from their domestic market. He has two big cattle and thirty small cattle. He is planning to expand his business. Ergash needs financial support to buy cattle to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle to expand his business.

loans.name: Sulma Yaneth

texts.es:
Sulma, de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta octavo grado, no pudo seguir sus estudios debido a que sus padres no tuvieron los recursos económicos suficientes, para poder brindarle una mejor educación.- Sulma, está acompañada, tiene 3 hijos y es empleada en una empresa de venta de pollos desde hace 2 años, también se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, .

Sulma, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería desde la edad de 24 años, sus padres le enseñaron este trabajo, pero su esposo también le ha enseñado mucho, ya que él tiene mucho conocimiento sobre estos trabajos.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar 2 novillos de repasto, para engordarlos y cuidarlos para que se  desarrollen y venderlos cuando se acerque el vencimiento del crédito.- Con la ganancia espera suplir algunas necesidades básicas en sus hogar.

El sueño de Sulma, es apoyar sus hijos para que se preparen academicamente y darles un futuro digno.
texts.en: Sulma is 28 years old. She studied up to 8th grade. She was not able to continue studying, because her parents did not have enough resources to afford a better education for her. Sulma lives in a common law marriage and has three children. For two years she has worked as an employee of a company that sells chickens, and she also works in agriculture and animal husbandry. Sulma has worked in agriculture and animal husbandry since she was 24 years old. Her parents taught her this job, but her husband has also taught her a lot, because he knows a lot about this work. She will use the loan to buy 2 young bulls to breed and fatten, so they grow and she can sell them when the loan is due. With the earnings she will be able to pay for some of her household basic needs. Sulma's dream is to support her children, so they get prepared academically and she gives them a good future.

loans.use: to buy two young bulls for breeding and fattening.

loans.name: Turwanyubukene Group

texts.en: Turwanyubukene is a group led by Philomene who is 47 years old. The group name means “Poverty Ligation” in English. She has been a group leader for 6 years. She sells food stuffs and has been in business for 13 years. The group members sell different items and they have the same idea for changing their life. With the loan, Philomene would like to buy more bananas to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “RETO AL FUTURO”.

El  socio es el  Sr. Claudio; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de repuestos  y a la vez brinda servicio técnico de electrodomésticos, el socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido, el socio lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de tornillos, alicates entre otros.
texts.en:
He is a member of the Reto Al Futuro [Future Challenge] communal bank. This member is Claudio. 

He juggles his time between his daily tasks and a business buying and selling spare parts. He also services household appliances. 

He is thankful and values the approved loan through Kiva. Through this source he commits to making the agreed payments over the time period.

He has been in this business for years and it is going well thanks to the effort that he puts into the business daily. He wants to continue working in this way to continue supporting his family.

He is requesting a loan to purchase screwdrivers, pliers, etc.

loans.use: to purchase screwdrivers, pliers, etc.

loans.name: Zef

texts.en: Zef owns a storehouse and a food store located not far from his home. He is requesting this loan now to proceed with the ownership certification and fees.

loans.use: to pay for the store ownership certification.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Elizabeth; La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de fabricación y venta de velas, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua elaborando las velas para todos sus clientes que le solictan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de parafina.
texts.en:
This is Elizabeth, she continues to make a living through manufacturing and selling of candles. She has been in this business for years and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day. 

She continues to produce candles for all the customers who want them, as this is the way that she provides for her family. She is asking for a loan to purchase paraffin among other things.

loans.use: to purchase paraffin wax.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 38 years. She is married to Abisai, and together they have been blessed with children of ages between 16 and 7 years. 

Mary sells clothes, a business she has done for the last 10 years, earning a monthly income of Kshs. 20,000.

Mary has requested for her third loan with VisionFund Kenya of Kshs. 45,000, which she will use to add more bales of clothes to sell.

With the anticipated profits, Mary will be able to educate her children.

Her hope and dream for the future is to succeed.

loans.use: to add more bales of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 53 years old and married with 15 children; five of whom are in school. Nora works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Nora has been in this business for 13 years.

In the future Nora would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a married woman, and has been blessed with three kids who attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

Mwanasiti operates a fish selling business which has been operational for over two years. She mentioned seasonality as a challenge in the business. Mwanasiti dreams of becoming a wholesaler of fish in the future. 

With the Kshs 50,000, she wants to purchase sacks of fish to sell to her customers. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Savet's Group

texts.en:
Savet’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Savet makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. 

Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en: Zainab is a 38-year-old married mother of three children who has been selling clothes from her house since 1999 to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family. Zainab is an ambitious woman and a hard worker who is trying desperately to develop her business. She is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to open her own clothes shop, as she wants to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of winter clothes to satisfy her customers' needs. Zainab hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and stay capable of providing her family with better life.

loans.use: to open her own clothes shop, as she wants to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of winter clothes.

loans.name: Hakilissiguiton  1 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupes Hakilissiguiton1 sont des hommes mariés  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans, 7 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Sincina-Sesso, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Ils collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités de maraîchage. Ils sont à leur 2ème  prêt. 
La spéculation cultivée est  le choux-pomme et laitues  avec Mamoutou, assis au bout vers la droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, il compte acheter des Semences, intrants et matériels en vu d’exploiter sa partielle de 0, 25 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 160 000FCFA en fin de période.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et faire face à ses dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Hakilissiguiton 1 group are married men who, on average, are 40 years old and have seven children. They all live in traditional families in Sincina-Sesso, one of the villages in Koutiala, in the third administrative region of Mali. They are collaborating with the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better carry out their market gardening. They are on their second group loan.

Mamoutou, who is seated at the end on the right of the photo, grows cabbage and lettuce. With his loan, he plans to buy seeds, inputs, and materials to farm a quarter hectare of land. After the harvest, crops are sold in the village and in Koutiala to a mixed group of customers. 

Mamoutou hopes to earn an average profit of 160,000 francs CFA at the end of the season. These earnings will allow him to pay back his loan and take care of his everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy seeds, inputs, and materials

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
La señora Consuelo es una mujer muy emprendedora y creativa, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de centa de mercancía.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que ella salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán sus hijos a los cuales desea enseñarles del negocio y dejarles un legado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar surtido de mercancía como ropa y accesorios de vestir.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a una veterana lleno de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
Consuelo is a very enterprising and creative woman who, for a long time, has wanted to be independent and have her own business selling merchandise.

Currently she can make her dream come true thanks to her great capacity for work, the support that she gets from Corporación Interactuar, and to the people who want her get ahead with her business. 

Her children will depend on this business, and she wants to teach them the business and leave them an inheritance.

She asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of merchandise such as clothing and accessories.

With this loan you can support a veteran full of life and drive for her family!

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of merchandise such as clothing and accessories.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decidió comprar un negocio que según él le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Adquirirá un negocio de bar en el municipio de San Antonio De Prado, con el cual planea sostener a su familia compuesta por sus dos hijos y su esposa.

Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para comprar este negocio que le está ofreciendo un amigo.

Para lograr esto necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar la totalidad del negocio y poder tomarlo para el mismo. 

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de un Colombiano con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Cesar, in his search of a promising future and some good opportunities to get ahead, decided to purchase a business that, according to him, will give him all that he always has dreamed of.

He will acquire a bar business in the municipality of San Antonio de Prado, with which he plans to sustain his family, which is made up of his two children and his wife.

His primary difficulty is the lack of capital to purchase this business that a friend is offering him. 

To manage this, he needs the help of a loan from Corporación Interactuar that will permit him to purchase the whole business and be able to take it on for himself.

Support the enterprising dreams of a Colombian with a loan today!

loans.use: to purchase the whole business and be able to take it for himself.

loans.name: Angel Jose

texts.es:
Angel, de 20 años, desea iniciar con un negocio de prestación de servicios de jardinería y poda de prados con el afán de buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder sobrevivir.

En el momento, encuentra su motivación para trabajar incansablemente en su hija y es así como desea ofrecerles lo mejor para su vida y desarrollo.

Hoy en día su hija tiene 3 años y se han convertido en la alegría de este hombre trabajador.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una guadañadora que le permita iniciar con este negocio.

Con este préstamo podrá sostener su negocio y a su hija brindándole una calidad de vida mejor.

Apoya a Angel para que pueda montar su negocio!
texts.en: Angel is 20 years old. He wants to start offering gardening and lawn mowing services, with the purpose of finding an activity that generates income for him to survive. Currently, he is very motivated to work tirelessly for his daughter, so he can offer her the best for her life and development. Nowadays, his daughter is 3 years old and has become this working man's joy. He is requesting a loan to buy a mowing machine that will allow him to start this business. With this loan he will be able to support his business and his daughter, offering her a better quality of life. Support Angel so he can begin his business!

loans.use: to buy a mowing lawn machine that allows him to start this business.

loans.name: Hakilissiguiton  2 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupes Hakilissiguiton 2 sont des hommes mariés  ayant une moyenne d’âge de36 ans, 5 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Sincina-Sesso, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Ils collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités de maraîchage. Ils sont à leur 2ème  prêt. 
La spéculation cultivée est  le choux-pomme et laitues  avec Guedioma, assis au bout vers la gauche sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, il compte acheter des Semences, intrants et matériels en vu d’exploiter sa partielle de 0, 25 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 140 000FCFA en fin de période.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et faire face à ses dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Hakilissiguiton 2 group are married men who, on average, are 36 years old and have five children. They all live in traditional families in Sincina-Sesso, one of the villages in Koutiala, in the third administrative region of Mali. They are collaborating with the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better carry out their market gardening. They are on their second group loan.

Guedioma, who is seated at the end on the left of the photo, grows cabbage and lettuce. With his loan, he plans to buy seeds, inputs, and materials to farm a quarter hectare of land. After the harvest, crops are sold in the village and in Koutiala to a mixed group of customers. 

Guedioma hopes to earn an average profit of 140,000 francs CFA at the end of the season. These earnings will allow him to pay back his loan and to cover his everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy seeds, inputs, and materials

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
La socia  Judith se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa y negocio de prestar servicio de movilidad, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelantes, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar  polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Judith continues working at her business selling clothing and her business offering mobility services. She sells pants, blouses and shirts.  Through this business, the member wants to get ahead; her dream is to have a bazaar.  She asks for this loan to purchase shirts, sweaters, shirts and blouses.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, sweaters, shirts and blouses.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.en:
Mavluda was born in 1978 year. She is widowed and has two children. Mavluda’s children are little. She is only feed keeper of her children. She has been a sewer more than 10 years. She sews a variety of clothes. 

Mavluda has a workshop where she works from early morning till late evening to sew clothes. Mavluda is going to repair her workshop and in this way to improve business and to service to her clients in good condition workshop. 

She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy building materials for repairing her workshop. 

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy building materials for repairing the place of her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of energy saving Jikos

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter, 26 years of age, is married and together with his spouse they have been blessed with one child. He does motorcycle transport business and has been in the business for four years now. 

He will use this loan to buy another motorcycle and be able to serve more customers and thereby get more income. He will use the anticipated profits to provide for the needs of his children, and also start another business. 

This is his second loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and he paid his previous loan successfully. 

In future, he hopes to expand his business and be successful.

loans.use: To buy another motorcyle.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: Ibrahim is a 33-year-old married man and the father of only one child. He has attained a secondary school education and lives with his family in Sana'a city, Yemen. Ibrahim wants to purchase a taxi to work as a driver, to transport people from one place to another, to earn money that will help him make better living conditions for his family. Ibrahim has an amount of money but it is not enough to buy a taxi. In order to achieve his small business, Ibrahim turned to Al-Amal microfinance bank and asked for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to purchase a taxi to work as a driver. Ibrahim hopes to purchase another taxi and rent it out for a monthly fee.

loans.use: to purchase a taxi to work as a driver.

loans.name: Wilmar De Jesus

texts.es:
Wilmar, un joven de 26 años, vive en el municipio de La Ceja, una pequeña ciudad donde las oportunidades de salir adelante son difíciles y la competencia comercial es bastante dura.

Este joven de mente emprendedora y grandes deseos de salir adelante tiene el proyecto de iniciar con un negocio de comidas rápidas en el parque principal del municipio.

Con la ayuda de un préstamo, Wilmar podrá cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y poder generar sus propios ingresos, con los que pagara sus estudios y aportara a los gastos de su hogar.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de mesas, sillas, algunas adecuaciones locativas y en la compra de surtido e ingredientes para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Colabora a un joven emprendedor, de mente creativa y grandes sueños!
texts.en:
Wilmar, a young man, 26 years old, lives in the municipality of La Ceja, a small city where the opportunities to get ahead are difficult and the commercial competition is rather hard.

This young man, with an enterprising mind and great desires to get ahead, has a project to open a fast food business in the principal park of the municipality. 

With the help of a loan, Wilmar will be able to achieve his dream of being independent and be able to generate his own income, with which he will pay for his education and contribute to the household expenses. 

The money will be invested in the purchase of tables, seats, some infrastructure modifications, and in the purchase of an assortment of ingredients to prepare his dishes. 

Support a young entrepreneur with a creative mind and big dreams!

loans.use: to purchase tables, seats, some infrastructure modifications, and purchase an assortment of ingredients to prepare his dishes.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene works hard to support her family. Irene is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Irene has been in this business for 35 years now.

In the future, Irene would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Hello! Introducing Alice, a 62-year-old mother who is full of energy and a very hard worker. She hails from the Nyamira area of Kenya, an area with good and favorable weather patterns that support farming. 

Alice completed her secondary school education thanks to the financial support and effort of her parents, but never advanced. This never killed the spirit she has for succeeding in life. Alice has been farming for the past 25 years and through mixed farming, she has been able to take care of her family. She loves dairy farming and has even nicknamed one of her cows. 

Although Alice passionately loves farming, she faces the challenge of water shortages. Most of the rain water goes to waste, which is why she is seeking a loan to buy a water tank. Alice comes from an area where there is no piped water. Therefore this water tank will assist her to harvest water during the rainy seasons and also store water for home consumption. Harvested water will assist Alice to irrigate her farm, ensuring that there is a constant production of crops. This loan will turn around the life of Alice, as she will no longer have to walk for long distances in search of water, hence saving her time.

loans.use: To buy a water tank

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 50 years old and married with six children, two of whom are in school. Elsie works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional household goods to sell.

Elsie has been in this business for one year.

In the future, Elsie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional household goods to sell

loans.name: Hakilissiguiton  3 Group

texts.fr:
Les 6 membres du groupes Hakilissiguiton 3 sont des hommes mariés  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans, 4 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Sincina-Sesso, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Ils collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités de maraîchage. Ils sont à leur 2ème  prêt. 
La spéculation cultivée est  le choux-pomme et laitues  avec Issa, assis au bout vers la droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, il compte acheter des Semences, intrants et matériels en vu d’exploiter sa partielle de 0, 25 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 145 000FCFA en fin de période.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et faire face à ses dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The six members of the Hakilissiguiton 3 group are married men who are, on average, 33 years old and have four children. They all live in traditional families in Sincina-Sesso, one of the villages in Koutiala, in the third administrative region of Mali. They are collaborating with the micro-finance institutions Soro-Yiriwaso in order to better carry out their market gardening. They are on their second loan.

Issa, who is seated at the end on the right of the photo, grows cabbage and lettuce. With his loan, he plans to buy seeds, inputs, and materials to farm a quarter hectare of land. After the harvest, crops are sold in the village and in Koutiala to a mixed group of customers.

Issa hopes to earn an average profit of 145,000 france CFA at the end of the season. These earnings will allow him to pay back his loan and to cover his everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy seeds, inputs, and materials

loans.name: Benkola 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les 8 membres du groupes Benkola 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à  M’pessoba, un des villages de Koutiala, 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités de maraîchage pour la première fois.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’échalote, concombre et laitues  avec Maimouna Moussa, assise au bout vers la droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des Semences, intrants et matériels en vu d’exploiter sa partielle de 0, 25 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à Koutiala, après la récolte, à une clientèle mixte. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 140 000FCFA en fin de période.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et faire face à ses dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The eight members of the Benkola I group are married women who, on average, are 39 years old and have five children. They all live in traditional families in M'Pessoba, one of the villages in Koutiala, in the third administrative region of Mali. For the first time, they are collaborating with the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better carry out their market gardening.

Maimouna Moussa, who is seated at the end on the right of the photo, grows cucumbers and lettuce. With her loan, she plans to buy seeds, inputs, and materials to farm a quarter hectare of land. After the harvest, crops are sold in the village and in Koutiala to a mixed group of customers. 

Maimouna Moussa hopes to earn an average profit of 140,000 francs CFA at the end of the season. These earnings will allow her to pay back her loan and to cover her everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy seeds, inputs, and materials

loans.name: Khol

texts.en: Khol is a strong woman. She was born in 1963 and lives in the city. She is married and has two children. She has had a business for about thirteen years. She bakes a traditional pastry. Her husband helps her to deliver the order. She feeds her family her earnings. She is planning to buy ingredients for her business. She is asking for financial support to buy flour, oil, and all the needed ingredients for her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, and all the needed ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Mabel

texts.es:
Mabel es una mujer joven de 21 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y su negocio es la venta de pollo y embutidos.
Ella es emprendedora, alegre, optimista, feliz, de buena actitud, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona de ‘cruce villa Adela’ un sitio céntrico, caracterizado por conectar a varias zonas de la ciudad mediante el transporte público, desde este lugar se puede conseguir transporte a zonas alejadas de la ciudad, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 4-12 grados centígrados durante todo el año y a una altura de 3800 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Mabel es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro largo amarrado, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que está construida de ladrillo y cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de pollo y embutidos, variedades como; pollo criollo, semicriollo, gallina, pavos, oca, faisán y otros, labor que realiza en un cuarto alquilado cerca a su domicilio, de lunes a domingo durante todo el día. “el pollo es muy consumido por su carne blanda, porque es barato y lo cocinamos en muchas recetas…” comenta. Su sueño es tener una tienda más grande para vender huevo. Ella desea realizar la compra de pavo por mayor para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes por temporada de navidad. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que viene realizando esta actividad de manera independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Mabel solicita un préstamo para la compra de carne de pavo por mayor para satisfacer la demanda de temporada.
texts.en:
Mabel is a 21-year-old young woman, single, without children, and her business is selling chicken and cold cuts.

She is enterprising, happy, optimistic, cheerful, of good attitude, responsible and hard-working. Her business is located in the "Cruce Villa Adela" zone, a central place, characterized by connecting various zones of the city through public transportation. From this place, one can get transportation to distant zones of the city. It has a cold and dry temperature which varies during the day between 4-12 degrees centigrade during the whole year and is at an altitude of 3800 meters above sea level. 

Mabel has tanned skin, is short, has long black hair she keeps tied up, her native language is Aymará, and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for the business she does. She has her life in her parents' home, which is built from bricks and has drinking water, electricity, domestic gas, and sewer services. Her business is selling chicken and cold cuts, with varieties such as creole chicken, semi-creole chicken, hens, turkeys, goose, pheasant, and others. She does this work in a rented room near her home, from Monday to Sunday throughout the whole year. "Chicken is eaten a lot for its soft meat, because it is cheap, and because we cook it in many recipes..." she says. Her dream is to have a larger store to sell eggs. She wants to purchase turkey in bulk to satisfy her customers' demand in the Christmas season. This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the 1 year that she has been doing this work independently. 

For these reasons, Mabel asks for a loan to purchase turkey meat in bulk to satisfy the seasonal demand.

loans.use: to purchase turkey meat in bulk to satisfy the seasonal demand.

loans.name: Kyamukube Bakyara Nabasaija Tweyimukye Group.

texts.en:
Jane is a member of Kyamukube Bakyara Nabasaija Tweyimukye Group, where members guarantee each other. She is a married lady, aged 40, with four children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her main business is retail, and at the same time she does farming. She faces a challenge of competition. However, she hopes to make her business grow, and she wants to educate her children to higher levels of learning. 

Jane needs a loan to add stock of cassava flour, soap, and paraffin for selling.

loans.use: to add stock of cassava flour, soap, and paraffin

loans.name: Vahe

texts.en:
This young man is 19 years old and he lives in the village Ddmashen of Gegharkunik region. His name is Vahe, and he lives with his father and brother.

His father is a driver and he is also runs farming. His brother works at the gas station. Vahe is a student and a future economist. Vahe is studying here at the paid division of the distance learning department; simultaneously, he helps his father in farming and together they take care of their farm animals such as cows, a calf, pigs, sheep, and chickens. They sell the farm products from their house, since all of them do not have enough time to sell it at the city’s wholesale market. 

Vahe is happy to have a chance to work with Kiva lenders. He asks for this loan since he must pay his tuition fee for the first semester, and without Kiva lenders’ support, his family income does not allow him to do this repayment.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fee for the first semester

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is a married woman, and a mother of four children from Ormoc City, Leyte. Mary Ann has been engaged in a hog raising business for more than a year now. This is the source of her income. 

Mary Ann is asking to buy a loan to buy additional piglets to raise. This loan will help her improve her hog raising business, thus augmenting her profit and income. 

In the future, Mary Ann hopes to make her business sustainable.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Turwanyubukene Group

texts.en:
Anolah, aged 29, is the leader of the TURWANYUBUKENE group, which means “Poverty legation” in English. She is married and has 2 children aged 2 and 8 years, one of them going to school. The group members sell different products and they wish to expand their businesses to improve their future. 

Anolah has operated a business selling fruits for 10 years. She would like to use this loan to buy more mangoes and apples to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand her business and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more mangoes and apples to sell

loans.name: Yarlenys Enith

texts.es:
Yarleny a sus 27 años de edad, debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo y por necesidad económica se motiva a independizarse y conseguir ingresos por su cuenta, por eso desea iniciar un negocio de venta de helados que estará ubicado en su casa.

Ella desea ofrecer en su negocio las mejores marcas de helado, con esto espera conseguir los recursos necesarios para satisfacer sus necesidades básicas. 

Yarleny es una mujer trabajadora, pujante, emprendedora, solicita el crédito como apoyo para invertirlo en la compra de surtido de helados y conos para tener disponibilidad y variedad de productos que satisfagan los gustos de todos sus clientes, de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.

Gracias al apoyo de la Corporación Interactuar y a los prestamistas de Kiva podrá montar este negocio y conseguirá ser independiente.
texts.en:
Yarleny, 27, became motivated to make herself independent and earn income herself due to a lack of employment opportunities and the need to earn income. This desire moved her to start her own business, located in her home, selling ice cream.

She wants to offer the best ice cream prices at her business. With this strategy, she hopes to earn the income she needs to satisfy her basic needs.

Yarleny is a hard-working, thriving, and enterprising woman. She is requesting a loan for support to invest in stocking up on ice cream and cones to have a variety of products available to satisfy her customers’ needs. This will allow her to have a better quality of life and well-being.

Thanks to the support of Corporación Interactuar and Kiva lenders, she will be able to set up this business and continue to be independent.

loans.use: to stock up on ice cream and cones.

loans.name: Jose Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jose es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para superarlas y salir adelante junto con sus hijos. 

Hace aproximadamente 19 años inició desesperadamente la búsqueda de una fuente de ingresos para su hogar. Fue así como inició la cría y venta de pollos, negocio que le ha venido generando ganancias con las cuales puede sostener los gastos de su hogar. 

Jose busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de cuido para los pollos, adecuar el corral de sus pollos y comprar alimento para sus pollos. Sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar puede lograrlo.

Jose tiene la esperanza en que el préstamo le permita salir adelante con su negocio.
