loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes and onions for resale.

loans.name: Chiboga

texts.en:
Chiboga is a married woman and has been blessed with one child. Together with her husband, they live in their own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a fish selling business for over five years, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and perishability leading to losses.

With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase bundles of fish to resell. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish to resell.

loans.name: Tya Group

texts.en:
Taghred is the featured borrower for Tya Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbours and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Taghred is a 38-year-old married mother of three children. She started five years ago selling cosmetics and makeup to help her husband cover the needs and expenses of their family.

Taghred is a hard worker and an ambitious lady who is trying her best to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of cosmetics and makeup to satisfy her customers' needs. This loan will increase Taghred's income and improve her family's living conditions.

Taghred is the first lady standing on the left of the photo. With respect to the other group members, Zainab is the lady sitting in the middle, and Najlaa is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of cosmetics and makeup to satisfy her customers' needs

loans.name: Marilie

texts.en:
Marilie is a 38-year-old married woman and a mother of four children from Leyte, Philippines. Marilie is engaged in the retail sale of cosmetic products like lipsticks, perfume, lotion, toiletries and appliances. This has been the source of her income for more than five years now. 

Marilie is asking to take a loan to buy more stock to sell like perfume, lotion, makeup sets, toiletries and appliances. With this, she will be able to sell more to her customers, thus augmenting her sales and income. In the future, Marilie has hopes of making her business a success. Furthermore, she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like perfume, lotion, makeup sets, toiletries and appliances

loans.name: Lito

texts.en: Lito is a 46-year-old married man and a father of eight children from Leyte, Philippines. Lito has been engaged in a hog-raising business for more than 20 years now. This is the source of his income. Lito is asking to take a loan to buy more piglets to raise, and animal feed. With a loan, Lito will be able to raise more pigs, thus allowing him to sell more pigs after several weeks. In the future, Lito has hopes of making his hog-raising business more profitable and stable.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise, and animal feed

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a 60-year-old widow and a mother of two grownup children from Leyte, Philippines. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. Rosalina has been in the business for more than five years now. 

Rosalina is asking to take a loan to buy more stock to sell like rice, canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, condiments and snack foods. With this, she will be able to attract more buyers to her store. In the future, Rosalina has hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like rice, canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, condiments and snack foods

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
Walter tiene 26 años de edad, vive junto a su hermana y madre en casa de material rústico en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Su población se dedica a la agricultura, crianza de animales menores, ganado vacuno y comercio.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de pintado de fachadas de instituciones y casas de su distrito y caseríos aledaños desde hace 5 años, es solicitado por el buen trabajo que realiza, es un joven emprendedor que también se desempeña como ayudante en construcción de viviendas. Walter ha solicitado un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para su negocio de pintado, como un soplete eléctrico, que le permitirá realizar con mayor rapidez su trabajo, logrando captar mayor cantidad de clientes en su negocio, lo cual repercutirá en sus ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Walter is 26 years old and lives with his sister and mother in a house built from rustic materials in the district of Santo Tomás. Santo Tomás is located in the province of Cutervo, in the region of Cajamarca, which is in the northern highlands of Perú. Its population is engaged in agriculture, breeding of small livestock, cattle, and commercial trade.

For the past five years, he has made a living providing painting services for institutions and houses in his district and the surrounding villages. He is requested for the good work that he does. He is a young entrepreneur who also performs work assisting in housing construction.

Walter has requested a loan to invest in the purchase of materials for his painting business, such as an electric blowtorch. This would allow him to work faster and win additional customers in his business, which would increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase materials for his painting business.

loans.name: Nicolas Porfirio

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Nicolás es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, ella siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para desplazarse a distintas fincas para cumplir con sus obligaciones laborales. 

Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas.

 El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de una vaca lechera que le de un buen impulso a su negocio.
texts.en:
Work in the countryside is one of the hardest jobs these days for the huge effort which is needed to progress, but Nicolás is a man who never has given up due to the weather or the circumstances which could happen to him. He is always ready to get resources for his family. 

He gets up in the early hours of the morning to go to distant farms to fulfill his work obligations.

He alternates this work with the sale of milk he gets from his own cows. 

He wants to increase his working capital to guarantee the sustenance of his business and this is the reason that brings him to ask for a loan to invest in the purchase of a dairy cow that will give a good boost to his business.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow that will give a good boost to his business.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter, 26 years old, provides for his family, including his four sisters who are all in school. He does so largely through his business of mobile money transfers, which provides financial services to the unbanked in his community. Peter runs his business in Mufulira, Zambia.

By running his mobile money transfer business, Peter has been able to provide his community with accessible financial services, meaning that they no longer have to travel long distances. He has also empowered members of the community by offering them a safer place to make their transactions and by employing one person at his outlet. Peter hopes to someday open more Zoona outlets in areas where people still struggle to access financial services.

Peter is requesting a loan in order to buy a Zoona trading booth. He does not have enough cash to pay for the booth and has therefore opted to pay through a loan from Kiva. This loan will also provide Peter with essential transaction funds to service customers at his trading booth. He hopes that this loan will help him grow his business so that paying for his sisters’ school fees can become much easier.

loans.use: To buy a trading booth and to provide essential funds for him to serve people in his community who need to send and receive money

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Paula es una mujer soñadora, optimista y con muchas energías, trabaja muy duro todos los días para darle lo mejor a su familia; tiene 4 hijos. Ella tiene 46 años de edad.

Ella además de ser ama de casa, tiene un molino (máquina para moler) de nixtamal (grano de maíz cocido) que utiliza para prestarle los servicios de molido a su comunidad; ella aprendió esta labor porque una amiga se lo enseñó; de esta labor ella obtiene los ingresos económicos que su familia requiere para vivir; ella cuenta que ha notado que el molino es muy rentable y que puede ayudarle a adquirir otros bienes para su familia. El molino lo tiene aproximadamente hace 25 años. 

Ella quiere un préstamo para la compra de terreno; el cual pagará con los ingresos que le genera el molino de nixtamal.
 
El principal sueño de Paula es que en un futuro pueda tener otro negocio que le generen más ingresos.
texts.en:
Paula is a dreamer and is very optimistic and energetic. She works very hard every day in order to provide the best to her family. She has four children. She is 46 years old.

She is a housewife and has a cornflour mill that she rents to others in her community. She learned this work from a friend, who taught her. Through this work, she is able to earn the income necessary for her family. She says that her mill is very profitable and that it can help her to acquire other goods for her family. The mill that she works with is approximately 25 years old.

Paula is requesting a loan to buy land. She will be able to make her payments with the profits she earns from the cornflour mill.

Paula's greatest dream is to have another business in the future that will allow her to make even more income.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Chali

texts.en:
Chali, 25 years old, is friendly and very determined. She runs her own business, which provides financial services to people in her community. Chali lives in Kitwe with her two brothers and two sisters. Three of her siblings are unemployed and one sister is in college.

Chali has overcome many hardships in her life. She lost both her parents and had to step up and help her siblings. She values family and works very hard to support them. She enjoys running her business because she gets to interact with people on a daily basis. This keeps her in very high spirits. Chali believes that her business benefits the people in her community by providing a safe environment that is not intimidating. Her customers do not have to complete any forms to transact with her.

Chali is requesting a loan in order to increase her float, which is the money that Chali uses on a daily basis to run her business. Increasing her float will help Chali to serve more customers in her community who need access to financial services. 

This is Chali’s first loan. She hopes that it will help her grow her business so that she can earn more profits, which will make it much easier for Chali to continue supporting her family. She thanks Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to grow her business by increasing the money that she uses to serve customers on a daily basis

loans.name: Mousa

texts.en:
Mousa is a 19-year-old single man from a village near Jenin city. He lives with his parents in a small house. His father is an employee in a local firm.

Mousa opened a blacksmith workshop next to his home one year ago. He collects the used iron pieces and reproduces them in his workshop.
 
Mousa took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to build a Brix to keep the raw pieces of iron from the rain. By taking this loan, Mousa will be able to improve his business and increase the productivity. 

Mousa appears in the photo.

loans.use: to build a Brix to keep the raw pieces of iron from the rain

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 38-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Leyte, Philippines.  

Virginia has been engaged in a food vending business for more than three years now. She sells home cooked snack foods like pancakes, tempura and others. She is also into a rice retail business. 

Virginia is asking to take a loan to buy ingredients like flour, salt, spices and condiments, cooking oil and more rice to sell. This loan will help her to improve her business as well as her income. 

In the future, Virginia hopes to make her business successful and sustainable. Moreover, she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, salt, spices and condiments, cooking oil and more rice to sell

loans.name: Idelmer

texts.es:
Idelmer tiene 28 años de edad, es casado. Su familia es unida, vive junto a su cónyuge y sus cuatro menores hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pimpingos, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Esta es una comunidad de clima caluroso donde la vida es tranquila, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales, crianza de animales, comercio, entre otras actividades.

El se dedica al cultivo de café de la variedad catimore desde hace tres años. Adicionalmente junto a su esposa también se dedican a la crianza de animales menores como patos, gallinas y cuyes. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para dar un adecuado mantenimiento a su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la cosecha. De esta manera Idelmer espera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer un café de mayor calidad a sus clientes, lo que mejorará su nivel de ventas y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Idelmer is 28 years old and is married. He lives in his own house made of rustic materials with his wife and his 4 children in the district of Pimpingos, located in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region in the North Andes of Peru. It is a community with a warm climate where life is quiet. It's people work growing fruit, raising livestock, in commerce amongst other things.

He has worked growing coffee of the Catimore varietal for the last 3 years. Also together with his wife he has been raising small animals like ducks, chickens and guinea pigs. He has experience in the business and has good personal and labor references in the area. This loan will be used to buy manure and fertilizer to provide adequate maintenance for his coffee crops as well as pay for labor for the harvest. In this way Idelmer hopes to have higher production to offer a better quality coffee to his customers, which will increase his level of sales and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain his coffee crops as well as paying for labor for the harvest.

loans.name: Sylvester

texts.en:
Sylvester is an emerging entrepreneur in Lusaka, the capital city of Zambia. He is 24 years old and the first born in a family of seven. Sylvester is requesting a loan to buy a Zoona branded booth and float loan to ensure that he has enough money to fulfill customer transactions. This will help him to provide financial services to people in his community.

The trading booth will be used to serve customers in Sylvester’s community. Most of his customers are unbanked. Zoona has done market research in Sylvester’s community and has determined that the location for this trading booth is ideal. He is one of the operators of Zoona mobile money transfers in town and a large number of families are already using his service. However, such a high demand for his service means that people must wait in long queues. Having more money in the business will build on his current business and allow him to serve more members of his community. 

Once he secures a loan, Sylvester will be able to purchase a trading booth from Zoona, which will deliver the booth to his place of business and provide him with additional cash to serve his customers. Sylvester hopes that he will be able to process his clients’ transactions much faster with this additional capital. He is hopeful that, one day, the profits realized from his business will help him support his siblings so that they can finish their education.

loans.use: to buy a trading booth and provide the necessary funds for him to serve customers who need financial services in his community

loans.name: Allyn

texts.en:
Allyn is married with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Allyn is 38 years old and has four children who are in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. Allyn requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net.

Allyn has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Allyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es:
José, de 47 años de edad, está acompañado, es agricultor y estudió hasta sexto grado debido a que sus padres vivian en extrema pobreza.- Junto a su esposa, tuvo 2 hijos que estudiaron hasta quinto grado, porque le fué imposible seguir dandoles el estudio; por esa razón decidió enseñarles sobre la agricultura.

José, se ha dedicado por 25 años a la agricultura, lo aprendió de sus padres, ellos le enseñaron este trabajo.

José, se levanta muy temprano para ir al campo a trabajar la tierra, la distancia donde tiene la cosecha está a un kilómetro.- Siembra maíz y tiene que estar muy pendiente de su cosecha, para que sea de buena calidad, además, se dedica a la venta de pan, sale a vender a las casas vecinas en las mañanas y en las tardes su esposa y sus hijos le colaboran.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar una motocicleta para ir a vender pan a las comunidades vecinas, con este medio de transporte, se le hará mas fácil transportarse.

El sueño de José, es aumentar las ventas de pan, para generar mas ingresos y poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José, 47 years old, is partnered, is a farmer, and went to school up to the sixth grade due to his parents living in extreme poverty. Along with his wife, he had 2 children who went to school up to the fifth grade because it was impossible for him to continue to provide them an education. For this reason, he decided to teach them about agriculture.  

José has worked in agriculture for 25 years; he learned it from his parents, they taught him this work. 

José gets up very early to go to the fields to work the land; the distance to where he has his crops is one kilometer. He grows corn and has to be very vigilant with his crop, so that it is of good quality. In addition, he works selling bread; he goes out to sell it at the neighboring houses in the mornings and in the afternoons his wife and children work with him. 

The loan will be used to purchase a motorcycle to go to sell bread in the neighboring communities. With this means of transport, it will be easier to get around.

José's dream is to increase his bread sales to generate more income and be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Maria Anabelle

texts.en:
Maria Anabel is 39 years old, married, and has five children, three of whom are currently in school.

Maria Anabel is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Maria Anabel requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Maria Anabel has been in this business for 10 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Teofista

texts.en:
Teofista is a 52-year-old married woman from Leyte, Philippines. 

Teofista is engaged in a food sales business. She sells snack foods like bread, biscuits, and soft drinks. Teofista also makes an additional income through her manicure and pedicure service business. 

Teofista is asking to take a loan to buy more stock to sell like bread, biscuits, soft drinks, beverages and manicure materials like a nail cutter, nail polish, polish remover and others. 

Teofista believes that this loan will enable her to improve her stock thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Teofista hopes to make her business stable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like bread, biscuits, soft drinks, beverages, and manicure materials like a nail cutter, nail polish, polish remover and others

loans.name: Rodis Enid

texts.es:
Rodis ha tenido que soportar el duro verdugo del desplazamiento a causa de la violencia, ella vivía en San Carlos y se vio en la obligación de trasladarse hasta Tierra Alta en busca de una nueva oportunidad de vida para ella y sus hijos lejos de la violencia, la sangre y las balas.

Hoy en día vive en una humilde casa y se gana la vida vendiendo pipetas de gas, una actividad que aprendió de manera empírica con el afán de conseguir el sustento para sus hijos.

Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de varias pipetas de gar para poder abastecer su negocio y vender más. 

Con este préstamo para ofrecer sus productos y mejorar sus ventas de una manera considerable.

Hoy en día es una mujer fuerte y con gran espíritu emprendedor.
texts.en:
Rodis has had to tolerate the torments of displacement caused by violence. She lived in San Carlos and saw the need to move to Tierra Alta in search of a new opportunity in life for herself and her children, far from the violence, blood, and bullets.

Today, she lives in a humble home and earns a living selling gas pipettes, a skill she learned by experimenting on her own with the desire to keep providing sustenance to her children.

She is requesting a loan to buy various gas pipettes to stock up her business and sell more.

With this loan, she will offer her products and improve her sales considerably.

She is a strong woman with an enterprising spirit today.

loans.use: to buy various gas pipettes to stock up her business and sell more.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio es un hombre que trabaja de sol a sol para generar el sustento diario para su familia; que se compone de 9 hijos. Manuel tiene 47 años de edad.

Él se dedica a la compraventa de banano; esta actividad la ha heredado de sus padres porque ellos se dedicaban a lo mismo.  Esta labor la realiza en la aldea donde vive. Se dedicó a la compraventa de banano porque es muy rentable y le ayuda a genera los recursos económicos para sostener a su familia. Tiene 5 años de estar realizando esta actividad la cual realiza con la ayuda de sus hijos.
 
El uso respectivo que le dará al préstamo que solicita es la compra de banano por quintal. 

Unos de sus principales anhelos o sueños es que en un futuro sus ganancias le ayuden a ampliar su negocio y buscar más mercados y dedicarse a la exportación de banano.
texts.en:
Antonio is a man who works from dawn to dusk to generate the daily sustenance for his family, which is made up of 9 children. Manuel is 47 years old.

He works buying and selling bananas. He inherited this work from his parents since they did the same. He does this work in the town where he lives. He works buying and selling bananas because it is very profitable and it helps him to generate the economic resources to sustain his family. He has been doing this work for 5 years, which he does with the help of his children. 

The use that he will give to the loan he requests is the purchase of bananas by the quintal [approximately 100 pounds].

One of his principle desires or dreams is that in the future his earnings will help him to expand his business and seek more markets and work in exporting bananas.

loans.use: to purchase bananas.

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella works hard to support her family. Bella is married and has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like meat, canned goods, vegetables, etc.

Bella has been in this business for 27 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like meat, canned goods, vegetables.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Hello world! Meet Joan, a very hardworking farmer living in the Nyamira area of Kenya with her one child. She has a 0.5-acre piece of land where she raises dairy cattle and poultry and grows vegetables, maize, and bananas, and she also has a personal retail business. 

Her favorite part in farming is tending her farm and livestock. Her greatest challenge is lack of proper farming skills. 

Joan would like to expand her farm in a way that will bring in more income because she has a family to take care of. That’s why she needs this Kiva loan to enable her to purchase more poultry for more egg production. She says that this income will also help her expand her farm enterprise.

loans.use: To buy poultry.

loans.name: Xcell

texts.en: Xcell is a 25-year-old married woman and a mother of a 5-year-old child from Leyte, Philippines. She runs a small sari-sari (convenience store) business, selling various goods and items to the people in her neighborhood.  Xcell is asking for a loan to buy more stock such as noodles, bread, biscuits, soap, toiletries, canned goods, rice and condiments, to sell. This loan will enable Xcell to increase her stocks, thus attracting more buyers to her store. In the future, Xcell hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more stock such as noodles, bread, biscuits, soap, toiletries, canned goods, rice and condiments, to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers for the maintenance of his coffee cultivation

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 28 years old and from Albuera, Leyte. She is married with two children, ages 7 and 4. While her husband works as a mechanic, Elizabeth helps by operating a poultry business and a sari-sari (variety) store business. This has been ongoing for almost two years now.  

She is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy chicks, detergent, seasoning, toiletries, chips, canned goods and soft drinks. 

She hopes to establish a bigger business for better sustainability.

loans.use: to buy chicks, detergent, seasoning, toiletries, chips, canned goods and soft drinks

loans.name: Maregil

texts.en:
Maregil is a 53-old-married woman and a mother of two children from Leyte, Philippines. Maregil owns a small carenderia or eatery that sells home-cooked foods. Maregil has been in the business for more than three years now. This is the source of her income. 

Maregil is asking to take a loan to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, cooking oil and condiments, noodles, rice and soft drinks. With this, she will be able to cook and sell more to her customers, thus augmenting her sales and income. In the future, Maregil has hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, cooking oil and condiments, noodles, rice and soft drinks.

loans.name: Máyela Carolina

texts.es:
Diversos estilos, colores y tamaños de ropa ofrece Máyela en su pequeño negocio. Gracias a financiamientos anteriores ha logrado invertir en la compra de ropa y productos de belleza para venderla a los clientes que con el tiempo tienen más demanda de productos. Localizada en su casa de hogar, desea establecer una tienda que preste mejores condiciones y más opciones de compra. Solicita préstamo para la compra de camisas, vestidos, pantalones de niños y adultos para surtir su venta.
Máyela tiene muchos encargos especiales para estas fechas. Se siente realizada por la preferencia de sus clientes. Planea seguir con el comercio hasta alcanzar todas sus metas. Su familia siempre la apoyan, esto la mantiene feliz y con mayores deseos de superación. Espera seguir trabajando con crédito en el futuro ya que lo considera importante para progresar en su negocio.
texts.en:
Máyela offers diverse styles, colors and sizes of clothing in her small business. Thanks to the previous loans, she has managed to invest in the purchase of clothing and beauty products to sell them to her customers who, with time, have more demand for the products. Located in her house, she wants to establish a store that offers better conditions and more options for purchase. She asks for a loan to purchase shirts, dresses and pants for children and adults to stock her sales.

Máyela has many special orders these days. She feels accomplished due to her customers' preferences. She plans to continue with the business until achieving all her goals. Her family always supports her, this keeps her happy and with the greatest desire to better herself. She hopes to continue working with loans in the the future since she considers it important to progress in her business.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, dresses, and pants for children and adults.

loans.name: Veronica Maria

texts.es:
Veronica es una madre de un pequeño hijo de ya 5 años de edad y por el cual ha luchado incansablemente para sostenerlo y brindarle todo lo que necesita.

Encontró en la venta de mercancía como artículos para el aseo personal a través de catalogo, la manera para generar buenos ingresos estando cerca  de su hijo.

Hoy en día está iniciando con un capital muy pequeño y está en etapa de recolección de clientes, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos como cremas de manos, desodorantes, lociones, enjugues, entre otros, al por mayor y así poder abastecer su pequeño negocio con productos de calidad.

Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá impulsar su negocio y tendrá una mejor variedad de productos para ofertar, logrando así la consolidación de su negocio.
texts.en:
Veronica is the mother of a small child, who is already 5 years old, and for whom she has fought tirelessly to support him and offer him everything he needs. 

She found in the sale of merchandise, such as personal care products through a catalog, the means to generate good income while being close to her son.

These days, she is starting with a very small amount of capital, and she is in the stage of gathering customers. For this reason she asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of products such as hand creams, deodorants, lotions, and wipes, among others, in bulk, and in this way be able to supply her small business with quality products. 

With the help of the loan, she will be able to boost her business and will have a better variety of products to offer, managing to strengthen her business in this way.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of products such as hand creams, deodorants, lotions, and wipes, among others.

loans.name: Herber Ulises

texts.es:
Herber, de 49 años de edad, estudió hasta 9º grado, no continuó estudiando por falta de recursos economicos, está acompañado y tiene un hijo, se dedica a la agricultura y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar. 

Herber, se dedica a la agricultura y ganaderia desde la edad de 12 años, sus padres se esforzaron para enseñarle, ya que seria su principal fuente de ingreso en un futuro, se levanta muy temprano para ir al campo a trabajar.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar de 3 novillos de repasto, para engordarlos, cuidarlos y venderlos  cuando se acerque el vencimiento del crédito y con la ganancia cubrir algunas necesidades básicas en sus hogar.

El sueño de Herber, es ampliar y mejorar su vivienda, mejorar sus ingresos y ayudar a su hijo para que se prepare académicamente y tenga un futuro digno.
texts.en:
Herber is 49 years old. He studied up until the ninth grade, but did not continue studying due to lack of economic resources. He has one son. He makes a living in agriculture and his wife works in the household.

Herber has worked in agriculture and livestock since the age of twelve years old. His parents strove to teach him since it would be his principal source of income in the future. He gets up very early to go to the field to work.

The loan will be used to buy three steers for the pasture, to fatten them, care for them, and then sell them when close to the loan maturity. With the earnings he will cover some basic needs in their home.

Herbert's dream is to expand on and improve his house, increase his earnings, and help his son to prepare academically and have a good future.

loans.use: to purchase three steers for his farm.

loans.name: Marelvis Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marelvis con 49 años de edad, vive en unión libre y es madre de 4 hijos. Durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a diversas actividades de manera independiente, con lo que ha generado ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

Hace 12 años, comenzó a realizar la actividad de comercialización de cerdos, pues los compra, los cría, engorda y posteriormente los vende según el peso adquirido por el animal, esto le permite obtener los recursos para continuar con el cuidado y sustento de sus hijos. 

La titular es una mujer luchadora, pujante, se esmera cada día para salir adelante motivado por su familia, esto lo impulsó a solicitar el crédito con la Corporación Interactuar, para invertirlo en la compra de cerdos y lechones, así podrá tener disponibilidad suficiente para cumplir con los pedidos que le solicitan y mejorará su margen de utilidad e ingresos. 

De esta manera, Marelvis espera avanzar un paso más hacia el cumplimiento de su sueño principal, que es formalizar su negocio y montar un expendio de carne, que sea rentable y perdurable en el tiempo y lograr una estabilidad económica para darle a sus hijos la oportunidad de una mejor educación y tener buenas condiciones de vida.

Mejora la vida de esta colombiana con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Marelvis is 49 years old, has a common-law marriage, and is the mother of four children. In her productive life, she has made a living in different types of independent activities, which has allowed her to generate income and to provide for her family.

She began to sell pigs about 12 years ago. She buys, raises, fattens, and then sells the pigs according to the final weight of the animal. This work allows her to earn the income she needs to continue caring for her children.

She is a fighting and vigorous woman who works each day to move herself ahead; she is motivated by her family. They inspired her to request a loan from Interactuar. She will invest in the purchase of pigs and piglets; this will allow her to have enough to comply with requests from her customers and to improve her profit margin and income.

Marelvis hopes to move one step closer to her biggest dream, which is to formalize her business and to start up a meat vendor service. This would be both profitable and long-term, which would allow her to have economic stability. She would be able to give her children the opportunity for an improved education and to enjoy a higher standard of living.

Improve the life of this Colombian woman with this loan!

loans.use: to buy pigs and piglets.

loans.name: Climaco Jose

texts.es:
El señor Climaco desde muy joven se dedica a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y cría de animales, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.

Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería, tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando algunos lotes de ganado que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.

Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.

Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.

Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar podrá llegar muy lejos.
texts.en:
Climaco has worked in a variety of activities on the land like farming and raising animals since he was very young. These are things his father taught him so that he could get ahead in the world.

Today his main activity is farming and raising livestock. Improving his capital is his objective in buying a few groups of cattle which will allow him to stock up and generate greater income. This is the reason for him to request a loan.

He is a responsible father and loving towards his children. He lives on a farm with them and his wife who has always been his best company. He dreams of providing his children with a quality education so that in the future they can take care of themselves and be independent. Every day he works at his business and pursues doing things well. He knows that with the help of the Interactuar Corporation he can go far.

loans.use: to buy a few groups of livestock to stock up.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon was born in Mufulira, in the Copperbelt province, in May, 1976. She lives in Lusaka with her husband and their five children, aged 20, 18, 11, 8, and 1. The four oldest children are in school. Sharon went to the Luanshya Skills Training Centre (also in the Copperbelt), where she learned tailoring. From 1997 to 2000, she worked for Seviose in Luanshya.

This is Sharon’s first loan from Kiva, which she has requested so that she can purchase a Zoona branded trading booth to serve her customers. She does not have enough money to pay for the booth and has opted to get a Kiva loan. Sharon will use part of the money as a float to service customers who need to send and receive money from her booth. What Sharon likes most about her business is that it is helping her to interact with different people and that it is making a difference in her community. Her challenges include little working capital and network failures. But the benefits to the community, which include giving people an opportunity to send and receive money more easily, safely and quickly and to no longer have to walk long distances to transact, are immense and a big plus for her business.

Sharon's hopes for the future are to open up more outlets and to be able to provide reliable service to her customers. The proceeds from this expansion will help her to pay for her children’s school fees and to afford a decent life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a Zoona branded trading booth and increase the money that she uses to serve her customers

loans.name: Erwing

texts.es:
Erwing tiene 32 años, es conviviente, vive en casa de familiares junto a conviviente y 02 hijos y nieto. De familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Erwing se dedica al servicio agrícola y a la crianza y venta de cuyes y patos. Tiene experiencia en el rubro y es conocido. El desea invertir en compra de animales para negocio, pues desea diverificar e incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender toda la demanda insatisfecha que existe en el lugar, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Erwing is 32 years old, partnered, and lives in the house of relatives with his partner, two children and a grandchild. He lives in a community that works in trade, agriculture, and animal husbandry. His community is located in the district of Cayaltí, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Perú. 

Erwing works in farm services and raising and selling guinea pigs and ducks. He has experience in this field and is well known. He wants to invest in the purchase of animals for his business, since he wants to diversify and increase his animal stock to be able to meet all the unmet demand there is in this place, which will allow him in the short term to improve his income, increase his earnings and, in the end, improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to invest in diversifying and increasing his animal stock.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario tiene 34 años de edad, es casado, vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. La población del distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público en su mototaxi en el distrito de Pucará y pueblos cercanos. Adicionalmente se dedica a la agricultura. Cuenta con clientes fijos en la zona quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El destino del crédito será para invertir en arreglos a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Mario espera brindar un servicio de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y por ende le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 34 years old and is married. He lives with his wife and two children in a rural part of the district of Pucará, located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region, in the North Andes of Peru. The people of the district work mainly in agriculture, commerce and arising livestock.

Mario works providing public transportation with his motorcycle taxi in the district of Pucará and neighboring areas. He also works in agriculture. He has regular clients in the area who can provide good personal and labor references for him. The loan will be used to invest in repairs to his vehicle that currently is in poor condition. Doing this Mario hopes to provide better quality service to his clients which will increase hie level of income and in the end allow him to improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to invest in repairs of his vehicle which currently is in poor condition.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz, a sus 51 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos, a los que ha sacado adelante con arduo esfuerzo y dedicación. 

Durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado como comerciante independiente en su propio almacén de ropa; allí trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas y ha logrado generar los ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares.

Expresa que su interés con el crédito es invertir en la compra de surtido al por mayor como blusas, jeans, pantalones de dama, entre otros para abastecerse lo suficiente y poder satisfacer los gustos de su clientela con la variedad que ofrecerá; esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas  y los ingresos que recibe, además le hará frente a su mayor desafío que es sostenerse frente a la competencia desleal que se presenta en el sector. 

Luz manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y pagar la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz, 51 years old, is a single mother of 2 children, whom she has gotten ahead with arduous efforts and dedication.

For a long time, she has worked as an independent salesperson in her own clothing store. There, she works every day for 10 hours and has managed to generate the income to pay for the family needs. 

She says that her interest in the loan is to invest in the purchase of a bulk assortment of clothing such as blouses, jeans, and ladies' pants, among others, to stock it sufficiently and be able to satisfy the tastes of her customers with the variety that she will offer. This will help her to improve her sales and the income that she gets, in addition it will help her confront her biggest challenge which is to sustain herself in the light of the disloyal competition in the area.

Luz says that her greatest desire is to improve the conditions of her house and pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase a bulk assortment such as blouses, jeans, and ladies' pants.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 51 years old and married with three children, one of whom is currently in school. Maria works very hard to provide for her family.

Maria runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, spices, etc.

Maria has been in this business for 10 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, spices, etc

loans.name: Benta

texts.en:
Benta is 25 years old. She is married and together with her spouse they have been blessed with one child. She is in the transport business via her motorcycle, which she has operated for the last two years alone.

Benta has requested her first loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES 20,000, which she will use to start a grocery business to complement her transport business and increase her income. Benta will be able to get supplies of vegetables.

With the anticipated profits, Benta will be able to restock her business further. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to be successful in business and to educate her children.

loans.use: to start a grocery business

loans.name: El Paraiso Group

texts.es:
El banco de emprendimiento EL PARAISO compuesta por ocho integrantes todas son mujeres, ellas se dedican a distintas actividades como; venta de jugos batidos, venta de celulares,  venta de refrescos, venta de cosméticos, venta de comida y venta de ropa, para solicitar un préstamo y ampliar sus negocios.
Sabina es una mujer de 50 años de edad, soltera, tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida tipo snack.
Ella es buena madre,  responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad de ‘El Torno’ un área rural caracterizada por el comercio entre agricultores y comerciantes mayoristas que reparten los productos a mercados de la ciudad. De clima cálido tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura constante entre 18-35 grados centígrados durante todo el día.
Sabina es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro largo, habla español, viven en la casa de la familia que esta construida de ladrillo y cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Su negocio es la venta de comida tipo snack, como: empanadas de queso, salteñas (empanadas de carne a horno), tucumanas sándwiches  refrescos, gaseosas, etc. en un puesto de venta al aire libre en la puerta de su domicilio; ‘ hasta el momento me ha ido bien porque la calle es muy transitada y los productos que ofrezco son de buena calidad…’ comenta. Su sueño es mejorar su calidad de vida y desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de mesas y sillas para atender a mayor cantidad de clientes de mejor manera. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en un 14 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Sabina solicita un préstamo para la compra de mesas y sillas para brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes
texts.en:
The El Paraíso entrepreneurial bank is made up of eight members, all of whom are women, who work in various jobs such as smootie sales, cellphone sales, soft drink sales, cosmetics sales, food sales, and clothing sales, to ask for a loan to expand their businesses. 

Sabina is a 50-year-old woman, has a 7-year-old child, and her business is selling snack foods. 

She is a good mother, responsible, and hardworking. Her business is in the "El Torno" locality, a rural area characterized by trade between farmers and wholesalers who distribute the products to the markets in the city. It has a warm, tropical, and humid climate, with a constant temperature between 18-35 degrees centigrade during the whole day. 

Sabina has tanned skin, is short, has long black hair, speaks Spanish, and lives in the family home which is built of brick and has drinking water and electricity. Her business is selling snack foods such as cheese empanadas, salteña empanadas (baked meat empanadas), tucumana empanadas [in the style typical of Tucumán], sandwiches, cold drinks, soft drinks, etc. in an open-air food stand at the door of her house. "It has been going well for me because the street has a lot of traffic and the products I offer are of good quality..." she says. Her dream is to improve her quality of life and she wants to expand her business through the purchase of tables and chairs to better serve a larger number of customers. This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the 14 years that she has been doing this business. 

For these reasons, Sabina asks for a loan to purchase tables and chairs to offer more comfort to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs.

loans.name: Santos Silverio

texts.es:
Santos de 37 años de edad estudió hasta 9° de educación básica, está felizmente casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a la crianza cerdos y pollos de engorde. Tiene 3 hijos de 16,14 y 9 años de edad, que al igual que él trabajan en una quesera de la comunidad.

Santos es empleado y tiene  20 años trabajando en una quesera ubicada en la comunidad donde reside, esta experiencia le ha generado gran confianza con su patrón. Ahí se dedica a  realizar todas las labores correspondientes a la realización del queso, desde que se cuaja la leche hasta que se prensa y se espera el tiempo necesario para su maduración un hijo suyo también trabaja con él y otro hijo trabaja en otra quesera cercana.

Santos necesita el préstamo para comprar una prensa para hacer queso y el equipo necesario, pues piensa en un futuro independizarse y dedicarse a la elaboración de queso artesanal, además quiere reparar un vehículo en el que movilizará con la leche y el producto terminado.

Santos sueña con tener su propia quesera en donde puedan involucrarse todos los miembros de su familia y así generar los ingresos suficientes para gozar de una excelente calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos is 37 years old and studied until Grade 9 of basic education. He is happily married and his wife takes acre of the household chores and raises chickens and pigs. He has 3 children aged 16, 14 and 9 years old.

He works in a cheese-maker in his community. Santos is an employee and has been working in a cheese-maker in the community where he lives. This experience has created a great confidence from his boss. So he works doing all the processes making cheese from curdling the milk to pressing the cheese and waiting the time needed for it to mature. One of his sons works with him and another son works in a nearby cheese-maker.

Santos needs a loan to buy a press to make cheese and other necessary equipment as he is thinking of going independent and work making artisanal cheese. He also wants to repair a vehicle to transport the milk and the finished product. Santos dreams of having his own cheese production where all the members of his family can be involved and generate enough income to enjoy an excellent quality of living.

loans.use: to buy a cheese press and necessary equipment.

loans.name: Hector Antonio

texts.es:
Héctor, de 43 años de edad, está soltero, estudió hasta bachillerato, pero por diferentes circuntancias no pudo continuar sus estudios universitarios, ahora se desempeña como agricultor y vive con su madre actualmente.

Héctor, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años aproximadamente, su padre le enseño este oficio para que tuviera ingresos y pudiera defenderse en la vida, en la temporada  de cosechar le toca muy duro, ya que tiene que levantarse muy temprano para ir a sembrar y luego cuidar el cultivo, ya que de eso depende la calidad y los ingresos que tendrá.- 

También, se dedica a la venta de útiles escolares, tiene 5 años aproximadamente de dedicarse a este trabajo y en enero es cuando mas vende, por ser el inicio del año escolar.

El crédito, será utilizado para comprar cuadernos, lapices, bolígrafos, sacapuntas, lápiz de colores, reglas, libros y todo lo relacionado a librería, para tener surtido y ofrecer variedad de articulos escolares en esta temporada.

El sueño de Héctor, es ampliar la librería para generar ingresos y mejorar su vivienda, ya que esta en malas condiciones.
texts.en:
Héctor, 43, is single.  He finished high school but wasn't able to go to college due to various circumstances.  He works as a farmer now and lives with his mother. 

Héctor has worked as a farmer for about 20 years.  His father taught him the work so he would have an income and be able to take care of himself in life.  It's very hard for him during the growing season because he has to get up very early to go and plant, and then he has to take care of the crop.  Everything depends on quality and the income he'll earn.

He also sells school supplies.  He has been in this line of work for about five years.  January is when he has the most sales because it's the beginning of the school year.

The loan is to buy notebooks, pens and pencils, pencil sharpeners, colored pencils, rulers, books, and everything related to the bookstore.

Héctor's dream is to expand his store to earn more income and improve his home, which is in bad shape.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pens and pencils, pencil sharpeners, colored pencils, rulers, books, and everything related to the bookstore

loans.name: Diana

texts.en:
In the photograph are Diana and her husband, Rusul, who witnessed lightening striking their house while they were inside. “All of our appliances including the TV were destroyed; thank God that nothing happened to us. It came out of nowhere. There was no rain at all, the day that it happened. We were shocked,” said Diana and Resul almost at the same time. 

They are now requesting this loan to replace their appliances, in order to continue cooking and washing their clothes. They have two grown-up children and they are early retirees.

loans.use: to replace the electrical appliances that were destroyed when lightning struck their house with them inside.

loans.name: Chance

texts.en:
Chance is 34 years old. He is married with three children aged twelve, eight and five years. He completed high school in 1997, and now he runs a Zoona mobile money transfer business in Lusaka, Zambia. His business provides financial services to people in his community. The business is Chance’s only source of income.

Chance loves his business because it helps him to pay for his children’s school fees, even though it is a struggle sometimes. He feels that his business has become an extension of his family and it has sustained him. The main challenge Chance faces in his business is financial power. He does not have enough money to grow his business and serve all his customers, especially the ones who need to send larger amounts of money. It is for this reason that he has requested a Kiva loan. 

This loan will help Chance to grow his business by providing essential funds needed to serve more customers. He is hopeful that once he receives his loan, his business will improve, and he will make more profits. He will save some of his anticipated profits so that he will be able to expand and open up another outlet. Chance thanks the Kiva lenders for the chance to grow his business.

loans.use: To grow his mobile money business by providing essential funds to service more customers in his community who need financial services

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a 55 year old married woman and a mother of three children from Concepcion, Iloilo.

Leah runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Leah has been in the business for more than 17 years now.

Leah is asking to take a loan to buy more merchandise to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, condiments, eggs and others items. This will attract more buyers into her store thus increasing her sales and income.

In the future, Leah has hopes of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell like canned goods, noodles, rice, soda, beverages, soap, toiletries, bread, biscuits, condiments, eggs and others items.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Rodolfo inicio su pequeña industria con el apoyo de su familia. Hoy en día siempre junto con su familia siguen trabajando fuertemente para duplicar sus bienes y aumentar su producción. Diariamente  por las  mañanas lleva su ganado al rio para que puedan alimentarse del pasto fresco y tomar agua. Considera que, para poder mejorar el ritmo de su trabajo es necesario un pozo cerca del potrero donde mantiene su ganado, por lo tanto solicita préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción y de la misma manera para comprar alimento para su borregada. 
Insiste en realizar mejoras a su finca para que su ganado pueda tener un mejor desarrollo, pero sobre todo para que su familia disfrute de mejores condiciones de vida. Rodolfo planea ser un gran agricultor y ganadero. Su misión ha sido y será ser un joven ejemplar y nunca dejarse vencer por los obstáculos que existen en esta vida.
texts.en:
Rodolfo began his small industry with the help of his family. These days, always with his family, they continue working hard to increase their assets and increase their production. Daily, in the morning, he brings his cattle to the river so they can feed on the fresh grass and drink water. He thinks that, in order to improve the rhythm of his work, it is necessary to have a well close to the pasture where he keeps his cattle, so that he is asking for a loan to purchase construction materials and at the same time purchase feed for his herd. 

He perseveres in making improvements to his farm so that his cattle can develop well, but above all so that his family enjoys better living conditions. Rodolfo plans to be a great farmer and cattleman. His mission has been and will be to be a young role model and never let himself age due to the obstacles that are in this live.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials and, at the same time, purchase feed for his cattle.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 31 years old and single. She is living with her parents in Sibula, Lopez Jaena, Philippines. Jennifer has a retailing business; she sells cell phone load. She has had this business for five years. She finds it interesting because she can earn income easily. She requested a loan to pay for an additional amount of load for retail. Expanding her inventory will mean an increase to her income. 

Jennifer has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for two years. In the future, she hopes to mount a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to pay for additional cell phone load for retail

loans.name: Emilia Sofia

texts.es:
Emilia, junto a su esposo ha podido formar una unidad familiar y productiva bastante fuerte, ya que no solo prima el amor si no también los deseos de salir adelante y progresar como familia.

Ella se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos y pollos de levante, es una actividad aprendida de su esposo quien actualmente se dedica a esta actividad y ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos durante mucho tiempo.

Ella pide un auxilio económico para comprar algunos cerdos pequeños e irlos cuidando y criando para posteriormente venderlos.

Es una mujer soñadora y con gran voluntad, tanto así que ya piensa en grande y desea tener una marranera con gran capacidad.

Tiene gran ilusión y expectativa con este proyecto y confía en el buen corazón de los prestamistas de Kiva para crecer como empresaria.
texts.en:
Emilia together with her husband have been able to form a strong and fairly productive family unit based not only on love but the desire to get ahead and progress as a family.

She works raising and selling pigs and chickens. She learned the business from her husband who works in the same business. It has been her main source of income for a long time. She is requesting economic support to buy some small pigs that she can care for and raise to later sell them.

She is a woman who dreams with a strong will as so she thinks of the big picture and wants to have a large pig farm. She has great hopes and expectation for this project and has confidence in the good hearts of the Kiva lenders to grow as a business person.

loans.use: to buy some small pigs to raise.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Trinidad de 49 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a sus hijos y hermana en el distrito de Buenos Aires, ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. Esta es una comunidad de clima caluroso donde la vida es muy tranquila, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza en su domicilio, también vende gelatinas y mazamorras (postres) que ella misma prepara, es conocida en la labor que realiza y cuenta con clientes fijos en la zona quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos para su tienda así como insumos para la preparación de sus postres. Con esto Trinidad esperar ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y satisfacer sus gustos y necesidades logrando así aumentar su nivel de ventas lo que le generará un incremento en sus ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Trinidad, 49, lives in her own house with her children and her sister in the Buenos Aires district of the province of Morropón in the Piura region, on the northern coast of Peru.  This community has a warm climate and a peaceful lifestyle, and the residents work mainly in agriculture, commerce, and ranching.

She earns a living selling beer in her home.  She also sells gelatin and "mazamorra" (pastry) that she makes herself.  She's known for her work and has steady customers in the area who give her very good personal and professional references.

The loan is to buy a large quantity of products for her store as well as ingredients to make her desserts.

Trinidad hopes this will allow her to sell a wider variety of products to her customers and satisfy their tastes and needs.  That way she'll increase her sales, which will earn more income for her and allow her to improve her quality of life and her family's.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of products for her store and ingredients to make her desserts

loans.name: Rosa Gladys

texts.es:
Rosa de 56 años de edad estudió hasta bachillerato, está casada y su esposo trabaja para una empresa de bienes raíces como chofer, tiene 4 hijos de 42, 37, 33, y32 años de edad, pero con ella solo vive su hijo menor de 32 años de edad  con sus dos hijos y este trabaja como comerciante.

Rosa se ha dedicado desde que tiene nueve años de edad al comercio, pues su madre a eso se dedicaba y aprendió de ella que para ganarse la vida tenía que trabajar duro. Actualmente vende joyas y enchapados es su principal fuente de ingresos, pero también vende comestibles como poleadas y atol.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar productos enchapados,  en esta época navideña existe buena demanda de dicho producto, y quiere aprovechar para generar buenos ingresos.

Rosa sueña con vivir en bienestar con su familia y en cuanto a su negocio que perdure de forma que le permita establecer una vida digna.
texts.en:
Rosa, 56 years old, studied up to secondary school, is married and her husband works at a good business as a driver. She has four children, ages 42, 37, 33 and 32 year old, but only the younger son, age 32, lives with her, with his two children, and he works in commerce.  

Rosa has worked since she was 9 years old in commerce, since her mother also worked in this and she learned from her that to earn a living she has to work hard. Currently, she sells jewelry and gold-plated products. It is her primary source of income, but she also sells food such as poleadas [a hot drink made of milk and flour] and atol [a cornflour drink]. 

She asks for this loan to purchase gold-plated products. In the Christmas season, there a good demand for these products, and she wants to take advantage of this to generate good income. 

Rosa dreams of living well with her family and in regards to her business, that it continue in a way that allows her to establish a life with dignity.

loans.use: to purchase gold-plated products.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es:
Noemi tiene 21 años de edad, es casada, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Es una comunidad hospitalaria donde la vida es muy tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes, patos y gallinas, su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como para el mantenimiento del lugar donde los cría. Dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales con gran influencia en el negocio, con esto Noemi espera incrementar su nivel de ingresos lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Noemi is 21 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the district of Oyotún, located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region,on the North Coast of Peru. It is a friendly community where life is very quiet. The people work mainly in agriculture, raising livestock and commerce.

She works raising and selling small animals like guinea pigs, ducks and chickens. Her business is located behind her house. She has experience in this field and has good personal and labor references from the area. This loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of animals as well as doing maintenance on the place where she raises the animals. This investment will help her to have greater variety and productivity in animals which will change the business greatly. Doing this Naomi hopes to increase her level of income which will permit her to improve her quality of living.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals as well as do maintenance on the place where she raises them.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine works hard to support her family. Geraldine is married and has a repair shop business in the Philippines.

Geraldine requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her repair shop.

Geraldine has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Geraldine would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her repair shop

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a 38 year old man. He is married with three children of which two go to school.

Vincent is a first time borrower from Ugafode Microfinance Ltd and a resident of Wamala trading center, a city suburb. He intends to take a loan of UGX 2,000,000 to add stock to his charcoal trade business.

He is so grateful for the support given to them as low income earners and his future plan is to venture into alternative energy sources because forests are dwindling. He is a hard working man.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Laila

texts.en:
Laila is a 26-year-old, married woman from Nablus city. She is a mother for two children; a son and a daughter. Her husband is an employee in a local firm. He gets a very low income. Laila started her own business, which is a grocery store. She sells basic grocery products and kids candy. 

Laila took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to add more items in her grocery store to sell. By taking this loan, Laila will be able to increase her sales and also her income.  Laila appears in the photo in her grocery store.

loans.use: to add more items in her grocery store to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Lourdes

texts.en: Ma. Lourdes is a rice retailer from Leyte, Philippines. She is 27 years old and married. Ma. Lourdes has sold rice for more than seven years now. This is the source of her income. Ma. Lourdes is asking to take a loan to buy more rice to sell. With a loan, Ma. Lourdes will be able to improve her inventory, allowing her to sell more to her customers. In the future, Ma. Lourdes hopes to make her business more productive and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be innovative. She operates a retail shop where she sells sugar, flour, bread, soap, and other household items. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a competitive area, and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient working capital to buy more inventory. She will use the 40,000 KES loan to buy more sugar, flour, soap, and other items. Her business goal is to expand to a wholesale business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be a wholesaler. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, soap, and other items

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is a 48-year-old married woman and a mother of four children from Concepcion, Iloilo. Marlyn works with her husband in their fishing business. Fishing is a lucrative venture in their place. 

Marlyn is requesting a new loan to buy a new boat engine. This loan will help Marlyn and her husband improve their fishing business thus augmenting their income. In the future, Marlyn has hopes of making their fishing business a success.

loans.use: to buy a new boat engine

loans.name: Husniya

texts.en:
Husniya was born in the year 1985. She has 4 young children. Husniya’s husband works in a school and he is an accountant.

Husniya has had her own business for more than 7 years. She buys cattle, feeds them for some months and sells them in a local market. Husniya’s main family income is from animal husbandry. She has been developing her business little by little and maximizes her profit. She is asking for a loan of 7,300 TJS to buy cattle and increase her working capital.

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to increase her working capital and buy cattle.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia   Gloria se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia por medio de este pequeño negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia ya tiene varios años, el sueño de la socia es tener otra tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar,galletas, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gloria continues with her grocery store business. She sells basic products such as rice, sugar, milk and crackers. 

She wants to get ahead through this small business, she's had it for several years now and her dream is to have another grocery store. 

She is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, crackers, and milk. 

Gloria is happy with the loan and commited to making her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, crackers and milk.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is 32 years. He is married to Caroline and together they have been blessed with 2 children aged 6 and 4 years. Caroline sells french-fries, and hence provides additional income for the family.

Bernard is a butcher, a business he has been in for the last 4 years, earning a monthly income of KES 30,000.

Bernard has requested his 3rd loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES. 45,000 which he will use to add stocks of pork meat for resale.

With the anticipated profits, Bernard will be able to expand his business further.

His hopes and dreams for the future are to have a pig farm.

loans.use: to add stocks of pork meat.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor tiene 55 años de edad, es casado, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyuge y su menor hijo en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades económicas principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes, cerdos, gallinas, entre otros, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos, con ello Victor espera satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes ofreciéndoles un producto de mejor calidad lo que aumentará su nivel de ventas, mejorará sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Victor is 55 years old, married, lives in his own house made of rustic materials with his spouse and their young child in the district of Pucara, located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru. The main economic activities in this district are agriculture, livestock and trade.

He works raising and selling small animals such as guinea pigs, pigs and chickens, among others. He has experience in business and has very good personal and work references in the area. This loan is to invest in buying more animals to increase the stock of his business and to purchase nutritional feed for them. From this, Victor hopes to meet the needs of his customers by offering the best quality product that will increase sales, improve his income and therefore his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy more animals to increase the stock of his business and to buy nutritional feed for them.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David tiene 38 años de edad, es casado, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa y sus 05 hijos en el distrito de Querocotillo, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica al cultivo de café variedad Catimor, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 15 años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la cosecha. Esto le permitirá mejorar la calidad del café que ofrecerá a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ventas y le permitirá tener una mayor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
David is 38 years old, married and lives in his own house made of rustic materials with his wife and their 5 children in the Querocotillo District, located in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru. The community where he lives is a small rural area where the inhabitants are mainly engaged in agriculture, livestock and trade.

He cultivates coffee of the Catimor variety. He has carried out this activity for 15 years and has experience in the industry with very good personal and work references in the area. This loan is to buy fertilizers for proper maintenance of his coffee cultivation and to recruit labor for the harvest. This will allow him to improve the quality of coffee he can offer his customers which will increase sales and allow him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to maintain his cultivation of coffee and to recruit labor for the harvest.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es:
Jose es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.

Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo de Plátano; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Tierra Alta.

Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito con la Corporación Interactuar para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes, abonos y la compra de semillas de Plátano.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.

Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is a humble and hardworking countryman, with drive and cry that distinguishes him from the men and women of the countryside.

He is a man of the enterprising mind; and since he was young, he learned all of the farming tasks such as crops and raising animals, so much so that today he has his own plantain crop.  These are crops that he sells in the marketplace in the Tierra Alta district.

This man intends to grow crops and to improve the ones that he already has.  This is why he is requesting the help of a loan from the Corporación Interactuar to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, manures, and to buy plantain seeds.

The loan will give him the opportunity to progress as an entrepreneur and as a person, in addition to increasing his income and continuing to provide the sustenance of his home.

The only thing he wants is to be able to improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, manures, and to buy plantain seeds.

loans.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es:
La señora Maria es una veterana de mil batallas vividas a lo largo de su vida, vive en el municipio de Medellín con su esposa y sus tres hijos que tiene en la universidad.

Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y desde hace algún tiempo viene trabajando en el negocio de la venta de productos lácteos. 

Su negocio consiste en la compra y venta de estos productos. Ella ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante y cuando un cliente le hace un pedido, intenta satisfacer su necesidad a toda cabalidad. 

Manifiesta que es un negocio muy sencillo de realizar para su edad.

Ella solicita un préstamo para compra de surtido de yogures, quesos, quesitos, kumis, entre otros para aumentar su inventario y mejorar sus ventas en esta temporada de navidad.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de capitalizar su negocio y de darle un impulso considerable a su actividad, permitiéndole obtener recursos para la universidad de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria is a veteran of a thousand lived battles over her lifetimes. She lives in the Medellin municipality with her husband and three children who attend the university. She is a very hard-working woman and for some time has had a business selling dairy products. Her business consists of buying and selling these products.
